Biography_ZH: Michael Saylor 是 Strategy（MSTR）的执行董事长，一家他于 1989 年创立的美股上市商业智能公司，同时也是持有 499,096 枚比特币的大型机构。他还创立了 Alarm.com（ALRM），为 48 项以上专利的发明人，并著有《移动浪潮》一书。他成立了 Saylor Academy（saylor.org），这是一家为超过 200 万学生提供免费教育的非营利组织。他是比特币标准的推动者（hope.com），拥有麻省理工学院航空航天及科学史双学位。他常在 X（@saylor）和个人网站 Michael.com 分享观点。他与 Lex Fridman 的 4 小时深度访谈，系统阐述了他对比特币、通胀和货币未来的看法，在 YouTube 获得近 1100 万观看。
Biography_EN: Michael Saylor is the Executive Chairman of Strategy (MSTR), a publicly traded business intelligence firm & holder of ₿499,096 that he founded in 1989. He is also the founder of Alarm.com (ALRM), named inventor on 48+ patents, & author of the book “The Mobile Wave”. He founded the Saylor Academy (saylor.org), a non-profit that has provided free education to over 2 million students. He is an advocate for the Bitcoin Standard (hope.com) with dual degrees from MIT in Aerospace Engineering & History of Science. He posts his views on X @saylor and his website Michael.com. His 4 hour interview with Lex Fridman summarizes his thoughts on Bitcoin, Inflation, and the Future of Money with ~11 million views on YouTube.
Interview1_ZH: 从 MicroStrategy 到个人资产配置，你如何向 MENA 的机构解释“把比特币作为企业金库主资产”的风险与回报平衡？
Interview1_EN: From MicroStrategy to personal allocation, how do you explain to MENA institutions the risk–reward balance of using bitcoin as a primary treasury asset?
Interview2_ZH: 你如何看待中东主权资金、家族办公室在未来 3–5 年内配置比特币的节奏和路径？
Interview2_EN: How do you see Middle Eastern sovereign funds and family offices pacing their bitcoin allocation over the next 3–5 years?
Interview3_ZH: 面向 Bitcoin MENA 2025 的观众，您认为未来三年比特币在中东地区最具突破性的应用会出现在何处？
Interview3_EN: For the Bitcoin MENA 2025 audience, where do you see the most transformative applications of bitcoin emerging across the Middle East over the next three years?

Biography_ZH: 币安创始人。
Biography_EN: Founder of Binance
Interview1_ZH: 这两年您一方面在做 Giggle Academy 等教育项目，另一方面又持续在全球各地露面演讲。站在 2025 年这个时间点，您现在最核心的使命感是什么？您更希望留给行业的长期遗产，是一个交易平台体系，还是一整套关于教育、合规与基础设施的方法论？
Interview1_EN: Over the past two years, you’ve been building education initiatives such as Giggle Academy while also continuing to appear and speak around the world. Standing here in 2025, what would you describe as your most fundamental sense of mission now? In the long run, what legacy do you most hope to leave for this industry: a leading trading platform ecosystem, or a comprehensive playbook for education, compliance, and underlying infrastructure?
Interview2_ZH: 回顾过去几年监管与市场的博弈，你认为哪一个决策是比特币行业“躲过的最大风险”？
Interview2_EN: Looking back at recent regulatory and market battles, what do you think was the biggest existential risk for bitcoin that the industry successfully avoided?

Biography_ZH: Michael Novogratz 是 Galaxy Digital 的创始人兼 CEO，曾任 Fortress Investment Group LLC 的合伙人兼总裁。在加入 Fortress 之前，Novogratz 曾在高盛工作 11 年，于 1998 年晋升为合伙人。2012 至 2015 年，他曾担任纽约联储金融市场投资咨询委员会成员。Novogratz 现为 The Bail Project 主席，长期推动刑事司法改革，并参与多个公益与学术组织，包括 NYU Langone Medical Center、Princeton Varsity Club 及 Jazz Foundation of America。他毕业于普林斯顿大学经济学专业并服役于美国陆军直升机飞行员。
Biography_EN: Michael Novogratz is the Founder and CEO of Galaxy Digital. He was formerly a Partner and President of Fortress Investment Group LLC. Prior to Fortress, Mr. Novogratz spent 11 years at Goldman Sachs, where he was elected Partner in 1998. Mr. Novogratz served on the New York Federal Reserve’s Investment Advisory Committee on Financial Markets from 2012 – 2015. Mr. Novogratz serves as the Chairman of The Bail Project and has made criminal justice reform a focus of his family’s foundation. He also sits on the Board of Overseers at NYU Langone Medical Center and is a board member of Princeton Varsity Club and Jazz Foundation of America. Mr. Novogratz received an AB in Economics from Princeton University and served as a helicopter pilot in the US Army.
Interview1_ZH: 在 Galaxy 的视角下，比特币已经从“宏观对冲工具”走向“主流资产配置”，你现在最关注的风险变量是什么？
Interview1_EN: From Galaxy’s vantage point as bitcoin moves from macro hedge to mainstream allocation, which risk variable are you watching most closely now?
Interview2_ZH: 面对比特币 ETF 的快速发展，你认为 MENA 的机构会以怎样的顺序从现货 ETF 走向更复杂的比特币相关产品？
Interview2_EN: With bitcoin ETFs maturing rapidly, in what sequence do you expect MENA institutions to move from spot ETFs into more complex bitcoin-linked products?
Interview3_ZH: 面向 Bitcoin MENA 2025 的观众，您认为未来三年比特币在中东地区最具突破性的应用会出现在何处？
Interview3_EN: For the Bitcoin MENA 2025 audience, where do you see the most transformative applications of bitcoin emerging across the Middle East over the next three years?

Title_ZH: Head of Cyber Security, United Arab Emirates Government
Title_EN: Head of Cyber Security, United Arab Emirates Government
Biography_ZH: Mohamed Al Kuwaiti 博士是阿联酋政府网络安全负责人、UAE 网络安全委员会主席，主导国家级网络战略、韧性建设与重大创新，使阿联酋在 2024 年 ITU 全球网络安全指数排名跻身世界前列。他同时兼任国家数据中心董事总经理，并在多项国际合作中担任核心角色，包括反勒索软件倡议联席主席、OIC-CERT 副主席。Al Kuwaiti 拥有 20 余年国家安全经验，受邀在 50 多个全球峰会发言，持有美国乔治华盛顿大学计算机工程与网络安全博士学位。
Biography_EN: H.E. Dr. Mohamed Al Kuwaiti is the Head of Cyber Security for the UAE Government and leads the UAE Cyber Security Council. He oversees the national cybersecurity strategy, resilience programs, and major initiatives that positioned the UAE among the top-ranked countries in the ITU Global Cybersecurity Index 2024. He also serves as Managing Director of the National Data Center and plays key international roles, including Co-Chair of the Counter Ransomware Initiative and Vice Chair of OIC-CERT. Dr. Al Kuwaiti has over 20 years of experience in national security and has spoken at more than 50 global events. He holds a Ph.D. in Computer Engineering and Network Security from George Washington University.
Interview1_ZH: 从国家网络安全的角度看，大规模采用比特币和公链基础设施会给 UAE 带来哪些全新的攻防挑战？
Interview1_EN: From a national cybersecurity perspective, what new offensive and defensive challenges does large-scale adoption of bitcoin and public chains pose for the UAE?
Interview2_ZH: 在你参与的国际合作中，关于比特币与加密犯罪的叙事有哪些被严重夸大，哪些又被严重低估？
Interview2_EN: Across your international work, which narratives around bitcoin and crypto crime are most exaggerated, and which real risks are still underestimated?
Interview3_ZH: 面向 Bitcoin MENA 2025 的观众，您认为未来三年比特币在中东地区最具突破性的应用会出现在何处？
Interview3_EN: For the Bitcoin MENA 2025 audience, where do you see the most transformative applications of bitcoin emerging across the Middle East over the next three years?

Biography_ZH: Paul Manafort 是一名资深政治战略师和顾问，曾长期活跃在地缘政治一线并深谙政治、经济、科技的交汇。他曾担任美国总统竞选团队主席，对比特币和区块链颇有研究，主张数字资产可助力金融独立与去中心化，观点兼具传统金融知识和前瞻视角，是比特币变革潮流中的独特声音。
Biography_EN: Paul Manafort is a seasoned political strategist and consultant with decades of experience in navigating complex geopolitical landscapes. As a former chairman of a major U.S. presidential campaign, he has a deep understanding of the intersection between politics, economics, and emerging technologies. In recent years, Paul has taken a keen interest in the potential of Bitcoin and blockchain technology to transform the global financial system. He brings a unique perspective on the role of cryptocurrency in fostering financial independence and decentralization. Paul’s insights offer a valuable blend of traditional financial expertise and a forward-looking view on the disruptive power of digital assets, making him a compelling voice at the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution.
Interview1_ZH: 本次 Bitcoin MENA 之行，您最希望向中东和全球比特币参与者传递的一个核心观点是什么？
Interview1_EN: At Bitcoin MENA, what is the single core message you most want to share with bitcoin builders and investors across the region and globally?
Interview2_ZH: 结合您在 Trump for President, 2016 的一线经验，过去一年中哪一个具体事件最改变您对比特币或数字资产未来的判断？
Interview2_EN: Based on your frontline work at Trump for President, 2016, which concrete event in the last year most changed your outlook on the future of bitcoin or digital assets?
Interview3_ZH: 面向 Bitcoin MENA 2025 的观众，您认为未来三年比特币在中东地区最具突破性的应用会出现在何处？
Interview3_EN: For the Bitcoin MENA 2025 audience, where do you see the most transformative applications of bitcoin emerging across the Middle East over the next three years?

Biography_ZH: Ahmed Bin Sulayem 是 DMCC 执行董事长兼 CEO，将该区从 2003 年的 28 家初创企业发展为全球领先的国际商务区（2025 年已超 2.5 万家公司、8 万雇员）。他推动迪拜商品贸易创新，主导 JLT 超大规模商务和住宅社区建设，并负责 DMCC 最新地产项目 Uptown Dubai。作为迪拜钻石交易所与商品交易所主席，他带领阿联酋成为第一个担任金伯利进程（KP）主席的阿拉伯国家，并多次连任。
Biography_EN: Ahmed Bin Sulayem is the Executive Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of DMCC and has driven its growth from a start-up of 28 member companies in 2003 to the world’s leading international business district in 2025 with over 25,000 member companies from 180 countries, employing over 80,000 people.Tasked with enhancing commodity trade flows through Dubai, DMCC has introduced to the market a number of value-added products and services under Mr Bin Sulayem’s leadership. In 2023, DMCC was named ‘Global Free Zone of the Year’ by The Financial Times fDi Magazine, for a record ninth consecutive year.Mr Bin Sulayem oversaw the exponential growth of the DMCC Free Zone master development in Jumeirah Lakes Towers (JLT), a 200-hectare business and residential community in Dubai of over 100,000 people living and working in 87 towers. Mr Bin Sulayem also oversees the development of DMCC’s latest real estate project, the Uptown Dubai district.Mr Bin Sulayem currently serves as the Chairman of the Dubai Diamond Exchange (DDE) and the Dubai Gold & Commodities Exchange (DGCX).The Kimberley Process officially appointed the United Arab Emirates (UAE) as the first and only Arab country to Chair the Kimberley Process (KP) in November 2015. Shortly after, the UAE Ministry of Economy officially appointed Mr Bin Sulayem as the UAE’s Chair of the KP for 2016. Mr Bin Sulayem was reappointed Chair of the KP for a historic second time in 2024 and has continued his leadership role with the position of Custodian Chair of the KP in 2025.CV – DMCC• 2001 – Joined DMCC• 2002 – Appointed Chief Operating Officer (COO)• 2007 – Appointed Executive Chairman• 2019 – Appointed Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
Interview1_ZH: 你如何看待比特币和代币化资产在迪拜商品、黄金与钻石贸易中的实际落地节奏？
Interview1_EN: How do you see bitcoin and tokenized assets realistically integrating into Dubai’s commodities, gold, and diamond trade over the coming years?
Interview2_ZH: DMCC 在吸引加密公司和比特币基础设施企业方面，过去一年中做出的哪项政策或服务创新最有效？
Interview2_EN: Which specific policy or service innovation at DMCC has proven most effective over the last year in attracting bitcoin infrastructure and crypto firms?
Interview3_ZH: 面向 Bitcoin MENA 2025 的观众，您认为未来三年比特币在中东地区最具突破性的应用会出现在何处？
Interview3_EN: For the Bitcoin MENA 2025 audience, where do you see the most transformative applications of bitcoin emerging across the Middle East over the next three years?

Biography_ZH: Simon Dixon 是资深金融专家，聚焦银行、货币改革和地缘金融，曾在投行担任股票经纪、做市商等，因家族在互联网泡沫损失惨重而转投货币变革。他是最早解读比特币制度和货币属性的投资人之一，著有《Bank to the Future》，并通过 BnkToTheFuture 平台促成了超 25 亿美金的行业投资。Simon 致力于普及比特币如何对抗央行数字货币和金融专制，被业界誉为“比特币投资银行家第一人”，其 YouTube/BTC 硬核访谈广受关注。
Biography_EN: Simon Dixon has always considered himself a finance geek—obsessed with banking, monetary reform and geo-financial analysis that shape our world. After building a career as an insider in investment banking—as a stockbroker, market maker, and corporate finance banker—he developed a rare understanding of how the financial system really works. But when his father lost everything in the dot-com bust, Simon left his lucrative career behind to become a monetary reformer, determined not just to expose the flaws of finance but to fix them.That mission led him to Bitcoin when it was just $3—a moment that changed everything. Unlike most early adopters who were tech enthusiasts, Simon came from finance, and he decoded what Satoshi left behind: Bitcoin was not just money, but the tool that could end the corrupt financial system, dismantle the Federal Reserve, and strip power from those who abuse it. He saw how politicians and regulators would deliberately co-opt innovation to maintain control—something he experienced first-hand when his attempts to reform the UK banking system were blocked.With that foresight, Simon gained financial freedom through Bitcoin and became one of the earliest investors in the industry’s biggest names—including Coinbase, Kraken, BitPay, Bitfinex, Blockchain.com, Circle and Robinhood. He is also the author of *Bank to the Future* (2012), the world’s first published book to ever discuss Bitcoin.Recognized by Robert Kiyosaki as “the first guy to ever talk about Bitcoin,” praised by Richard Branson for his investment platform BnkToTheFuture.com, and called by Max Keiser “the No.1 Bitcoin investment banker ever,” Simon has long been ahead of his time. Through BnkToTheFuture, he has facilitated over $2.5 billion of investments into companies that shaped the Bitcoin ecosystem.He has helped thousands become Bitcoin millionaires and billionaires—and now seeks to help millions more protect themselves, their families, and their nations from an AI-driven jobless future and the oppressive control of central bank digital currencies (CBDCs)—with Bitcoin as the tool for freedom and protection.Simon is widely recognized not only for his pioneering role in Bitcoin but also for his expertise in geo-financial analysis, money, and investing. His ability to connect Bitcoin, macroeconomics, and global financial power shifts has allowed him to anticipate trends and events years before they unfold—making him the person many influencers and analysts quietly study.Through his weekly show BitcoinHardTalk (100k+ YouTube subscribers, 200k+ followers on X), Simon helps people follow the money, self-custody their Bitcoin, and resist an oppressive financial system whose time is running out.
Interview1_ZH: 你很早就从“货币改革”的视角拥抱比特币，目前在哪些国家或地区看到了这套逻辑真正开始落地？
Interview1_EN: Coming from a monetary reform background, in which countries or regions do you now see bitcoin genuinely beginning to fulfill that reform thesis?
Interview2_ZH: 从你在 BnkToTheFuture 的投资实践看，比特币相关公司最容易在哪个阶段犯下“传统金融式”的错误？
Interview2_EN: From your BnkToTheFuture investing experience, at which stage do bitcoin companies most often repeat the classic mistakes of traditional finance?
Interview3_ZH: 面向 Bitcoin MENA 2025 的观众，您认为未来三年比特币在中东地区最具突破性的应用会出现在何处？
Interview3_EN: For the Bitcoin MENA 2025 audience, where do you see the most transformative applications of bitcoin emerging across the Middle East over the next three years?

Biography_ZH: Abdulla Al Dhaheri 是阿布扎比区块链中心 CEO，主导数字资产创新并推动世界级交易所和做市商在阿布扎比分布，联动监管和主权机构，助力阿联酋在数字资产、AI 和资产代币化全球领先。Abdulla 也是数字资产基金投资人与各类基础设施项目推动者，曾为多家上市公司和全球大会提供洞见。
Biography_EN: Abdulla Al Dhaheri is the CEO of The Blockchain Center Abu Dhabi, leading the UAE’s flagship hub for digital asset innovation. He has played an instrumental role in bringing tier-1 global exchanges and market makers to Abu Dhabi, collaborating closely with regulators and sovereign stakeholders to build the UAE’s leadership in digital assets, AI, and tokenized finance. Abdulla previously advised multi-billion-dollar companies on public listings and digital asset adoption, and has been invited to speak at global conferences for his contributions to decentralized technologies. Today, he continues to invest strategically through The Blockchain Center Fund, scaling global digital asset ventures and sovereign-grade digital asset infrastructures from Abu Dhabi to the world.

Interview1_EN: At Bitcoin MENA, what is the single core message you most want to share with bitcoin builders and investors across the region and globally?

Interview3_EN: For the Bitcoin MENA 2025 audience, where do you see the most transformative applications of bitcoin emerging across the Middle East over the next three years?

Biography_ZH: Saifedean 是一位经济学家，《比特币标准》畅销书作者，同时著有《法币标准》、《黄金标准》和《经济学原理》等著作。他通过线上平台 saifedean.com 授课，并主持播客节目 The Bitcoin Standard Podcast，系统讲解货币史、通胀机制与比特币在全球金融体系中的角色。
Biography_EN: Saifedean is an economist and the author of the best-selling book, The Bitcoin Standard. as well as The Fiat Standard, The Gold Standard, and Principles of Economics. He teaches economics on his online learning platform saifedean.com and hosts The Bitcoin Standard Podcast.

Biography_ZH: John Koudounis 是 Calamos Investments 的总裁兼 CEO，该公司是美国第三大流动性另类资产管理机构。在他 2016 年上任以来，公司管理资产规模增至 460 多亿美元。他此前曾担任美洲区瑞穗证券总裁兼 CEO，显著扩充资本市场团队并提升盈利能力与客户基础。他也以推出全球首批带下行保护结构的比特币 ETF 而闻名，并长期活跃于 CNBC、Fox Business 与彭博等媒体及多个公益组织。
Biography_EN: John Koudounis serves as the President and CEO of Calamos Investments, the third largest liquid alternatives asset manager in the US. Under his leadership, the firm’s AUM has surged to over $46 billion, nearly tripling since he took the helm in 2016. Notably, he has overseen the launch of innovative products, including the world's first suite of downside-protected Bitcoin ETFs.With over 37 years of experience in the financial services sector, he previously held the position of President and CEO at Mizuho Securities in the Americas, where he significantly expanded the firm's capital markets teams and enhanced profitability, client base, and product diversity, elevating Mizuho to a top-tier global investment bank.In addition to his corporate responsibilities, Koudounis is recognized for his thought leadership, frequently speaking at global conferences and platforms such as CNBC, Fox Business, and Bloomberg TV. Koudounis is committed to philanthropy and is involved with several organizations including the Concordia Leadership Council, the SEAL Future Foundation, The Hellenic Initiative, and the Ecumenical Bartholomew Foundation.He holds a degree in International Diplomacy & Foreign Affairs and Economics from Brown University.

Biography_ZH: Marwan Al Zarouni 博士是全球知名的比特币与区块链倡导者，推动迪拜数字创新议程。作为迪拜区块链中心 CEO，他在比特币教育、应用与政策制定方面发挥了关键作用，曾入选 CoinTelegraph 区块链与加密领域百大影响力人物，并在世界经济论坛加密货币全球未来委员会任职，持续提升迪拜作为全球比特币和区块链创新枢纽的地位。
Biography_EN: Dr. Marwan Al Zarouni is a global Bitcoin and blockchain advocate driving Dubai’s digital innovation agenda. As CEO of the Dubai Blockchain Center, he has led regional efforts in Bitcoin education, adoption, and policy development. Recognized among CoinTelegraph’s Top 100 Most Influential Figures in Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies (2022), he also served on the World Economic Forum’s Global Future Council on Cryptocurrencies. Through his leadership, Dr. Al Zarouni continues to position Dubai as a global hub for blockchain and Bitcoin innovation.

Company_ZH: Minister of State for Blockchain and Crypto in Pakistan
Company_EN: Minister of State for Blockchain and Crypto in Pakistan
Biography_ZH: Bilal Bin Saqib 是巴基斯坦加密委员会 CEO，这一官方支持机构负责加速加密监管与数字资产创新，他同时担任巴基斯坦财政部长首席顾问。Bilal 曾入选福布斯 30 Under 30，并获查尔斯三世授勋为大英帝国成员，活跃于 Web2 与 Web3 创业及内容领域，将比特币视为推动金融独立与普惠金融的重要工具，并为特朗普家族支持的 DeFi 项目 World Liberty Financial 提供咨询。
Biography_EN: Bilal Bin Saqib is the CEO of the Pakistan Crypto Council, a government-backed advisory body accelerating crypto regulation and driving innovation across Pakistan’s digital asset landscape. He also serves as Chief Advisor to the Finance Minister of Pakistan.Named in Forbes 30 Under 30 and honored as a Member of the British Empire by King Charles III, Bilal is a force where conviction meets code. With ventures across Web2 and Web3, and a social media following of over 700,000, he’s part builder, part crypto diplomat — using Bitcoin not just as a technology, but as a tool for economic independence and, financial inclusion. Additionally, Bilal is also an advisor to the Trump-family backed DeFi project, World Liberty Financial.
Interview1_ZH: 本次 Bitcoin MENA 之行，您最希望向中东和全球比特币参与者传递的一个核心观点是什么？
Interview1_EN: At Bitcoin MENA, what is the single core message you most want to share with bitcoin builders and investors across the region and globally?
Interview2_ZH: 结合您在 Minister of State for Blockchain and Crypto in Pakistan 的一线经验，过去一年中哪一个具体事件最改变您对比特币或数字资产未来的判断？
Interview2_EN: Based on your frontline work at Minister of State for Blockchain and Crypto in Pakistan, which concrete event in the last year most changed your outlook on the future of bitcoin or digital assets?
Interview3_ZH: 面向 Bitcoin MENA 2025 的观众，您认为未来三年比特币在中东地区最具突破性的应用会出现在何处？
Interview3_EN: For the Bitcoin MENA 2025 audience, where do you see the most transformative applications of bitcoin emerging across the Middle East over the next three years?

Biography_ZH: Aaron van Wirdum 是《Bitcoin Magazine》的技术编辑，也是播客 Bitcoin, Explained 的联合主持人。他自 2013 年起撰写比特币相关内容，擅长用浅显语言解释复杂技术，重点聚焦比特币历史、扩容路线与隐私技术等议题。
Biography_EN: Aaron van Wirdum is the technical editor for Bitcoin Magazine and the cohost of the Bitcoin, Explained podcast. With a background in studying the historical influence of society-shaping technologies, he’s been covering Bitcoin and related projects since 2013. He is known for his ability to explain highly-technical subjects to a layman audience and specializes in topics including Bitcoin’s history, scaling and privacy technology.

Biography_ZH: 他是 Resolvr 的联合创始人，这是一家将全球保险市场与比特币对接的保险科技公司。同时，他也是《Bitcoin Magazine》和《Satoshi Papers》的作者之一。
Biography_EN: Cofounder of Resolvr, an insurtech bridging the global insurance market to Bitcoin. Published author for Bitcoin Magazine and the Satoshi Papers.

Biography_ZH: 他拥有超过 10 年面向高净值与机构客户的投资与比特币挖矿经验，目前也是一名经济学博士研究人员，研究方向涵盖比特币、比特币挖矿与能源经济学，重点关注利用弃水、弃风等边际能源开展挖矿，以及为中大型矿工提供具竞争力的矿池服务，特别是在中东与非洲地区。
Biography_EN: 10+ years' background in Investments / Bitcoin mining for HNWIs & Institutions. He is also conducting research as a PhD researcher in Economics focusing on Bitcoin, Bitcoin mining, and Energy Economics using stranded or curtailed energy sources, and the development of competitive mining pool services for medium-size to large miners in the MEA region

Biography_ZH: Abdumalik Mirakhmedov 是 GDA 执行总裁，这是一家全球最大、经验最丰富的比特币挖矿公司之一，近十年来专注数据中心建设、运营与扩张。GDA 在北美、南美、欧洲和中亚运营 20 个数据中心，总装机功率超过 600 兆瓦，已上线逾 18 万台矿机，致力于通过创新、负责任用能和社区投资强化比特币网络的韧性与安全。
Biography_EN: Abdumalik Mirakhmedov is Executive President of GDA, one of the world’s largest and most experienced Bitcoin mining companies, with a track record of building, managing, and scaling data center operations spanning nearly a decade.GDA champions innovation, responsible energy use, and investment in the communities where it operates globally, including 20 data centres across North America, South America, Europe, and Central Asia.With a total power capacity of over 600 MW, the company has brought over 180,000 miners online. GDA is committed to supporting the infrastructure for the future of money by making the bitcoin network more robust, resilient, and secure.

Biography_ZH: Abu Akkuc 是 21Million Fashion 的创始人兼创意总监，这是一家比特币主题时装品牌。他通过时尚展示比特币作为文化运动的一面，将“工作量证明”的精神——自律、坚持与真实——融入每个设计细节，并以高端子品牌 Orange Elite 将奢华、优雅与比特币的反叛气质结合。除了创业者身份，他也积极推动比特币教育，强调比特币在文化、社会和哲学层面的深远意义，用时尚让自由、独立和自我主权变得具象可感。
Biography_EN: Abu Akkuc is the founder and Creative Director of 21Million Fashion (Bitcoin fashion brand). With his brand, he demonstrates that Bitcoin is far more than a financial instrument – it is a cultural movement that inspires a new way of thinking. His collections carry the spirit of “Proof of Work”: discipline, perseverance, and authenticity are reflected in every detail. For him, fashion becomes a medium that makes freedom, independence, and creativity tangible.Under the umbrella of 21Million Fashion, Abu has also created a high-fashion subbrand, Orange Elite, which combines the highest quality standards with elegance and the rebellious energy of Bitcoin.Beyond his role as an entrepreneur, Abu is deeply committed to promoting Bitcoin education. He conveys the cultural, social, and philosophical dimensions of Bitcoin, making it clear that it’s not just about money, but about a new understanding of responsibility and self-determination. His work blends style with substance, showing how Bitcoin is shaping our culture and mindset in lasting ways.

Biography_EN: Founder & CEO of Simple Mining. We sell, host, and repair Bitcoin miners with the goal of making Bitcoin mining simple, accessible, and profitable for everyone.

Biography_ZH: Adam 是一位丈夫、四个孩子的父亲，也是一名致力于实现个人独立的比特币企业家。自 2013 年创立 Bitcoin Well 以来，他通过线上比特币门户和遍布加拿大的比特币 ATM，帮助用户轻松买卖和使用比特币，如今公司已在资本市场上市（代码 BTCW）。
Biography_EN: Adam is a husband, father of four and a bitcoin entrepreneur on a mission to enable independence. Since founding Bitcoin Well in 2013, Adam has made it easy to buy, sell and use bitcoin both online in the bitcoin-only portal, and in person at Bitcoin ATMs across Canada. Today, Bitcoin Well is a publicly traded organization (BTCW)

Biography_ZH: Adam Schneider（网名 “Seccour”）是比特币社区的重要成员，尤其活跃于阿联酋。他 2012 年在高中时第一次接触比特币，2010 年起定居迪拜，之后在大学攻读网络安全，进一步加深了对比特币底层技术的理解。自 2017 年起，他组织迪拜比特币 Meetup，建设本地比特币社群，致力于在阿联酋推广比特币与开发相关工具。
Biography_EN: Adam Schneider, better known as “Seccour,” is a prominent figure in the Bitcoin community, especially in the UAE. He discovered Bitcoin in December 2012 at the age of 16, while still in high school. Having lived in Dubai since 2010, Seccour later pursued cybersecurity studies at university, which deepened his understanding of Bitcoin’s underlying technology.Since 2017, he has organized the Dubai Bitcoin Meetup, fostering a community dedicated to learning about and engaging with Bitcoin. His work focuses on advocating for Bitcoin in the UAE and developing tools that contribute to the evolving Bitcoin landscape.

Biography_ZH: Alain Kunz 是 GSR 常务董事，负责公司全球业务发展。GSR 是数字资产交易与市场结构领域的全球领导者，也是加密行业重要的资本市场合作伙伴。在加入 GSR 前，他创立了多家金融服务与数字资产公司，并为公共与私人机构、政要和高净值人群提供咨询，聚焦创新、金融、科技与社会影响的交汇点。他职业生涯始于瑞银投行，毕业于圣加仑大学（HSG）。
Biography_EN: Alain Kunz is a Managing Director at GSR, where he leads Business Development for the firm - a global leader in digital asset trading and market structure, and a key capital markets partner to the crypto industry.Prior to joining GSR, Mr. Kunz founded several ventures in the financial services and digital asset sectors. He has also advised public and private institutions, political leaders, and high-net-worth individuals, focusing on the intersection of innovation, finance, technology, and societal impact.Mr. Kunz began his career at UBS Investment Bank after graduating from the University of St. Gallen (HSG). His career reflects a consistent commitment to bridging traditional finance and emerging technologies in an increasingly digital economy.

Biography_ZH: 他曾任 BTC.com 与 Poolin 比特币矿池的副总裁及联合创始人，是比特币挖矿领域的资深专家。他通过矿工主导软分叉（MASF）推动了 Taproot 升级，拥有 10 余年比特币挖矿经验，目前担任 DMND CEO 兼联合创始人，打造首个完全基于 StratumV2 的比特币矿池。
Biography_EN: Former VP & Co-Founder of BTC.com & Poolin bitcoin mining pools. Activated Taproot via miner-activated-softfork. 10 + years in bitcoin mining. Currently CEO & Co-Founder of DMND the first fully StratumV2 Bitcoin Mining Pool.

Biography_ZH: Alex Svetski 是作家与企业家，著有畅销书《UnCommunist Manifesto》和《Bushido of Bitcoin》，也是 Nostr 社交网络 Satlantis.io 的创建者之一，定位为面向主权个体的社交平台。他曾推出全球首款比特币储蓄应用 Amber，并开源了比特币主题大模型项目 “Spirit of Satoshi”。
Biography_EN: Alex Svetski is an Author and Entrepreneur.Aleksandar is the Author of the best selling “UnCommunist Manifesto” and the "Bushido of Bitcoin”. He is building the Nostr-enabled Social Network for Sovereign Individuals: Satlantis.ioPreviously, he launched the world’s first Bitcoin-only savings app: Amber, and open sourced The Spirit of Satoshi, a Bitcoin-centric LLM.

Biography_ZH: Alex Recouso 是 CitizenX 联合创始人兼 CEO，这是一家全球首个“公民身份市场”平台，帮助无数比特币持有者及其家庭优化护照与居留结构，提升选择权、主权与自由。他也为主权国家提供咨询，设计以预算中性方式通过公民与居留项目积累比特币的政策工具。
Biography_EN: Alex Recouso is the co-founder and CEO of CitizenX, the world's first citizenship market. CitizenX has assisted countless Bitcoiners and their families in diversifying their passport portfolios, providing greater optionality, sovereignty, and freedom. He also advises nation-states on designing and implementing citizenship and residency programs to accumulate Bitcoin in budget-neutral ways.

Company_ZH: Cambridge Judge Business School, Univeristy of Cambridge
Company_EN: Cambridge Judge Business School, Univeristy of Cambridge
Biography_ZH: Alexander 是剑桥大学替代金融中心（CCAF）的研究员，负责 Cambridge Digital Assets Programme 中关于数字资产气候影响的研究工作。凭借在加密挖矿与 DeFi 生态的实战经验，他被视为研究加密挖矿环境足迹的权威之一，其观点常见诸彭博、路透社、金融时报和福克斯新闻等主流媒体。加入 CCAF 前，他曾在企业银行、自营交易与资产管理等传统金融岗位工作，并拥有剑桥大学与林茨约翰内斯·开普勒大学的金融与 MBA 学位。
Biography_EN: Alexander is a Research Associate at the Cambridge Centre for Alternative Finance (CCAF), where he leads the Cambridge Digital Assets Programme’s research efforts on the climate impact of digital assets. Drawing on extensive practical experience within the crypto ecosystem – from cryptocurrency mining to engaging with DeFi protocols – he brings deep domain expertise to his work. Prior to joining the CCAF, Alexander held various roles in traditional finance, including corporate banking, proprietary trading, and asset management. He holds a Master’s degree in Finance from Cambridge Judge Business School, University of Cambridge, and an MBA from Johannes Kepler Universität Linz. Alexander is widely regarded as an expert on the environmental footprint of cryptocurrency mining, and his insights are frequently featured in leading media outlets such as Bloomberg, Fox News, Reuters, and The Financial Times.

Biography_ZH: 作为区块链技术和比特币最早的倡导者之一，他长期专注于知识普及与技术咨询，聚焦如何将比特币和区块链与现实世界系统对接。凭借扎实的技术背景和对比特币变革潜力的信念，他致力于构建可扩展的挖矿与云端解决方案，帮助个人与企业安全参与这一新兴金融网络。
Biography_EN: An early advocate for Blockchain technology and Bitcoin specifically, focusing on spreading the knowledge, sharing expertise and providing technical consulting, I've made Bitcoin and Blockchain my career for a good reason, I have a lot to contribute to it, the skill to teach people about it and the technical depth of advising on strategy, technology and integration with rest of the world.With my deep technical foundation and a strong belief in Bitcoin’s transformative potential, I focus on building scalable mining and cloud solutions that empower individuals and enterprises alike.

Biography_ZH: Alexandre 是 Capital B 的董事会成员及比特币战略总监，这是一家欧洲首家专注“比特币国库管理”的公司。他是一名坚定的比特币最大化主义者，专注以比特币为核心的企业资产配置与风险管理。
Biography_EN: Alexandre is Board Member and Director of Bitcoin Strategy at Capital B, Europe’s first Bitcoin Treasury Company. Alexandre is a committed Bitcoin maximalist.

Biography_ZH: Ali Alnuaimi 创立了 Shafra，活跃在阿联酋能源、科技与数字资产交叉领域。作为曾启动阿联酋首座核反应堆并出任航天局董事会成员的工程师，他离开公共部门，将比特币视为国家级能源与产业战略。他为政府、主权基金及 MARA 等大型机构提供比特币政策、能效与工业级挖矿咨询，并作为 Sui 等多个协议的创始顾问，推动政府、传统产业与 AI 驱动新技术的深度融合。
Biography_EN: Ali Alnuaimi founded Shafra and stands at the crossroads of energy, technology, and digital assets in the UAE. Once a nuclear engineer who launched the nation's first reactor and sat on the UAE Space Agency board, he left the public sector to advance Bitcoin as a strategic energy play. Today he counsels government leaders, sovereign wealth funds, and giants such as MARA on Bitcoin policy, energy efficiency, and industrial-scale mining. A founding adviser to the Sui protocol and partner to several others, he channels deep expertise and wide connections to unite government, legacy industries, and emerging AI-driven tech, securing lasting value through intellectual, political, and financial capital.

Biography_ZH: Alisia Painter 是 Botanix Labs 联合创始人兼 COO，团队正基于比特币构建 Botanix 区块链，解锁“比特币金融”。她拥有十多年以太坊经验和哈佛商学院 MBA，同时坚持比特币优先，专注扩展比特币可编程性，并通过 stBTC 等收益型资产把更多金融应用带到比特币之上。她多次在 CNBC、福布斯和 CoinDesk TV 分享比特币从“数字黄金”演进为金融基础设施的观点，并在各大行业峰会上探讨去中心化金融与机构采用的未来。
Biography_EN: Alisia Painter is the COO and Co-Founder of Botanix Labs, the team behind Botanix, the Bitcoin-based blockchain unlocking Bitcoin Finance. With over a decade of experience in Ethereum and an MBA from Harvard Business School, Alisia is a Bitcoiner at heart, focused on expanding Bitcoin’s programmability and bringing yield-bearing assets like stBTC to market.She has been featured in CNBC, Forbes, Schwab Network, Kitco News, and CoinDesk TV, sharing insights on Bitcoin’s evolution from digital gold to financial infrastructure, and regularly speaks at leading industry conferences on the future of decentralized finance and institutional adoption.

Biography_ZH: Allen Helm 于 2024 年联合创立 “Bitcoin for Corporations”（BFC），这是 Strategy（前 MicroStrategy）与 BTC Inc. 发起的联合计划，他目前担任业务发展与客户服务总监，负责产品落地、企业客户成功与业务拓展，帮助企业财务部门、服务商与资本配置方加速采用比特币。此前，他在《Bitcoin Magazine》和 Bitcoin Conference 负责企业合作与大会商务。
Biography_EN: Allen Helm co-founded Bitcoin for Corporations (BFC) in 2024, a joint initiative between Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy) and BTC Inc., where he now serves as Director of Business Development & Client Services. He leads product execution, client success, and business development, working with corporate treasuries, service providers, and capital allocators to accelerate global Bitcoin adoption.Previously, he scaled enterprise partnerships at Bitcoin Magazine and The Bitcoin Conference.

Biography_ZH: Alphonse 是 Flash 的联合创始人兼 CEO，该平台帮助法语非洲用户便捷获取比特币并摆脱法币束缚。他通过本地教育项目和会议分享，推动比特币在非洲的普及与应用。
Biography_EN: Alphonse is Co-founder and CEO of Flash, a platform that is helping people in Francophone Africa access Bitcoin easily and opt out of fiat. He also contributes to Bitcoin education through local initiatives and participate in conferences to share insights.

Biography_ZH: Andrej Majcen 是 Bitcoin Suisse 的联合创始人兼集团 CEO，这是一家瑞士历史最悠久、规模领先的加密金融服务机构，也是全球重要的托管与质押运营商之一。他自 2013 年创立公司以来，见证比特币从早期阶段到今天的大规模采用，并曾负责全球拓展与大客户业务。因其在区块链和金融科技领域的贡献，他入选 2020 年福布斯 DACH 地区 30 Under 30 名单。
Biography_EN: Andrej Majcen is the Co-Founder and Group Chief Executive Officer of Bitcoin Suisse, Switzerland’s leading and longest-established crypto-financial services firm. He co-founded the company in 2013, when Bitcoin was still nascent and Ethereum had yet to launch, and has since guided its growth into a major international brand—Switzerland’s largest custodian and one of the world’s foremost staking operators.Over the past decade, Andrej has held several senior leadership roles at Bitcoin Suisse, including Head of Global Expansion and Strategic Clients, before being appointed Group CEO in 2024. In recognition of his contributions to the blockchain and fintech industry, he was named to the Forbes 30 Under 30 DACH list in 2020.A frequent speaker at blockchain and finance conferences around the world, Andrej is a strong advocate for the transformative potential of digital assets to build a more inclusive, efficient, and resilient global economy.

Biography_ZH: Andrew Hohns 博士是 Newmarket 创始人兼 CEO，并在 2022 年创立 Battery Finance，主导约 500 亿美元名义金额的风险转移交易结构设计。他在证券化、比特币、责任投资与发展金融等领域经验丰富，曾任 Mariner Investment Group 与 Cohen & Company 的董事总经理，也在纽约大学斯特恩商学院任教，并担任 Fold Holdings Group、Bitcoin Development Corporation 和 UNICEF USA 董事。
Biography_EN: Andrew Hohns, PhD., Founder & Chief Executive Officer. Dr. Hohns founded Newmarket in 2020 and Battery Finance in 2022. He has overseen transaction structuring for approximately $50 billion of notional risk transfer. He has been a regular speaker at various industry conferences, with expertise in topics related to securitization, bitcoin, socially responsible investment, impact investment, infrastructure, and development finance. Prior to founding Newmarket, Dr. Hohns served as Managing Director at Mariner Investment Group from 2012 through 2020 and as Managing Director at Cohen & Company until 2012. Additionally, Dr. Hohns was an Adjunct Assistant Professor at New York University’s Stern School of Business from 2012 to 2015. He holds a BS in Economics from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania (2000), a Masters in Liberal Arts from the School of Arts and Sciences at the University of Pennsylvania (2006), and a PhD in Applied Economics and Managerial Sciences from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania (2012). Dr. Hohns is a member of the Board of Directors of Fold Holdings Group (NASDAQ:FLD), Bitcoin Development Corporation, Inc (NASDAQ: BDCIU), and UNICEF USA.

Biography_ZH: Andrew 是 Blockdaemon 首席营收官（CRO），负责全球营收与增长战略。此前他担任亚太区副总裁兼总经理，带领团队在该区域快速扩张，并与多家头部机构达成合作。在加入 Blockdaemon 之前，他曾在 AWS、思科与新电信/Optus 担任领导职位，在 AWS 期间负责初创、数字原生、加密/金融科技与 VC/PE 生态的合作拓展。
Biography_EN: Andrew is driving Blockdaemon’s global growth strategy as Chief Revenue Officer (CRO). In this role, he is responsible for driving and aligning all revenue generating processes across the organization. Previously, Andrew was VP and GM at APAC, where he has successfully led regional growth, forged strategic partnerships, and expanded market presence in the Asia Pacific Region. Prior to joining Blockdaemon, Andrew has held leadership roles in Amazon Web Services (AWS), Cisco Systems and Singtel/Optus. In AWS, Andrew built out the teams focussed on Startups, Digital Natives, Crypto/Fintech and AWS’s partnerships with the Venture Capital and Private Equity community. In Cisco, Andrew led sales and Business Development for several acquisitions and internally built software solutions, most notably the GTM in APAC for an acquisition, tail-f systems. In Optus Business, Andrew led and owned the P&L for the Data Centre and Cloud Practice.

Biography_ZH: Anthony Scaramucci 是全球另类投资公司 SkyBridge 创始人兼管理合伙人，也是 SALT 思想论坛与风投平台的创始人及主席。他著有六本书，最新作品为《The Little Book of Bitcoin》，并联合主持播客《The Rest Is Politics US》和《Open Book》。在创建 SkyBridge 之前，他共同创立 Oscar Capital，早年在高盛私人财富管理部门工作，曾入选 Cointelegraph 和 Worth Magazine 影响力榜单，并短暂担任白宫通讯主任。
Biography_EN: Anthony Scaramucci is the founder and managing partner of SkyBridge, a global alternative investment firm, and founder and chairman of SALT, a global thought leadership forum and venture studio.He is co-host of two podcasts, “The Rest Is Politics US” and “Open Book,” and author of six books, including most recently “The Little Book of Bitcoin.”Prior to founding SkyBridge in 2005, Scaramucci co-founded investment partnership Oscar Capital Management, which was sold to Neuberger Berman in 2001. Earlier, he worked in Private Wealth Management at Goldman Sachs & Co.In 2022, Scaramucci was ranked #47 in Cointelegraph’s Top 100 Influencers in Crypto and Blockchain. In 2016, he was ranked #85 in Worth Magazine’s Power 100: The 100 Most Powerful People in Global Finance. In 2011, he received Ernst & Young’s New York Financial Services “Entrepreneur of the Year” Award and is a member of the Council on Foreign Relations (CFR).Scaramucci served on President Donald J. Trump’s Presidential Transition Team Executive Committee in 2016 before serving briefly as White House Communications Director.Scaramucci, a native of Long Island, New York, holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics from Tufts University and a Juris Doctor from Harvard Law School.

Biography_ZH: Areeb Ahmad 以法律、权力与技术视角讲述比特币故事，常驻迪拜，为交易所和金融科技公司提供牌照与合规咨询，同时关注机构、AI 与代币化如何重新改写货币规则。
Biography_EN: Areeb Ahmad tells the story of Bitcoin through the lens of law, power, and technology. Based in Dubai, he advises crypto exchanges and fintechs on licensing and compliance, while questioning how institutions, AI, and tokenization are rewriting the rules of money itself.

Biography_ZH: Arjun Sethi 是 Kraken 联合 CEO，Kraken 是全球历史最久、最安全的加密平台之一。他同时是 Tribe Capital 联合创始人兼董事长，这是一家以数据科学与 AI 为特色的风投公司，投资组合包括 xAI、Rippling、Slack、Gusto 等多家独角兽。作为连续创业者，他先后创立并出售 LOLapps 和 MessageMe，并曾在 Social Capital、Yahoo 等机构担任重要职务，长期在风投与加密领域深具影响力。
Biography_EN: Arjun Sethi serves as Co-CEO of Kraken, one of the world’s largest,longest-standing and most secure cryptocurrency platforms.Arjun is widely recognized as one of the top early-stage ventureinvestors in Silicon Valley, as well as a successful founder andoperator.He is also Co-Founder and Chairman of Tribe Capital, a top venture capital firm focused on capturing a perpetual edge in venture and crypto using artificial intelligence and data science. Some of his noteworthy investments include xAI, Rippling, Applied Intuition, Slack, Gusto, Swarm (Sold to SpaceX), Shiprocket and Carta. Arjun was previously a Partner at Social Capital where he led the Venture Team focusing on early stage investing in the consumer and enterprise sector.Prior to his work in venture, Arjun co-founded and sold two successful software companies – LOLapps and MessageMe. LOLapps was acquired by 6waves to become the second largest game publisher on Facebook, and Arjun served as Chief Product Officer. His second company MessageMe was acquired by Yahoo, and Arjun subsequently joined Marissa Mayer’s executive team, where he led data and analytics teams and ran mobile and emerging products. He also served as a Board Observer on Alibaba.Arjun has a long track record of seeding, incubating, and growing investments - including as Co-Founder at Termina.ai, an AI-powered analytics platform used by leading institutional investors to diligence private market investments.He is also a Co-Founder at Kapital (AI powered software platform and bank), Ashvattha (platform for small molecule therapeutics), Foundation (humanoid robots), Ironfist (precision-targeted pharmaceutical treatment for tumors) and Nanopower Therapeutics (anti-inflammatory nanomedicine).

Biography_ZH: Arsh Molu 在人权基金会（Human Rights Foundation）推动金融自由，致力于支持威权政体下的人权捍卫者。他还是 Generation Bitcoin 和 Bitcoin Students Network 的联合创始人，搭建全球学生社群，培养下一代比特币领袖。
Biography_EN: Arsh Molu champions financial freedom at the Human Rights Foundation, an organization dedicated to defending human rights in authoritarian regimes. Arsh is also the Co-founder of Generation Bitcoin and the Bitcoin Students Network, worldwide communities that support younger generations in learning about Bitcoin, cultivating the next generation of Bitcoin leaders.

Biography_ZH: Austin Alexander 2011 年在华盛顿智库工作时接触比特币，2013 年在纽约共同创立全球首家实体比特币交易中心 Bitcoin Center。2014 年加入 Kraken，成为业内首位专职销售，2019–2022 年担任 Kraken 中东 CEO，领导拿下阿联酋首批数字资产交易牌照之一，目前是 10x Capital 合伙人。
Biography_EN: Austin Alexander discovered Bitcoin in 2011 while working at an economic policy think tank in Washington D.C. in 2013 he co-founded the New York Bitcoin Center, the world's first physical Bitcoin exchange. Austin served as the industries first sales executive when he joined kraken in 2014. From 2019-2022 he served as Krakens CEO for the Middle East in the first licensed exchange in the UAE. He is now a partner at 10x Capital

Biography_ZH: Belyi 是来自布隆迪的比特币倡导者、经济学家与社会企业家，创立了 BTC Shule，通过线下活动和线上培训在 Gitega 推动比特币教育与循环经济。他在乡村社区建设比特币使用场景，并积极在本地和国际舞台上呼吁通过比特币提升金融自主权，持有多项比特币专业认证，并正在撰写一本从非洲现实出发阐述比特币潜力的著作。
Biography_EN: Belyi is a Burundian Bitcoiner, economist, and social entrepreneur with a passion for technology and financial autonomy. He is the founder of BTC Shule, an initiative that educates Burundians on Bitcoin through meetups and online training, building a circular economy to foster financial autonomy in Gitega. He has been instrumental in building community-based Bitcoin adoption projects in rural areas and regularly advocates for financial autonomy through Bitcoin.Belyï holds several Bitcoin certifications, including the renowned Certified Bitcoin Professional (CBP), Sailor Academy, and Crack The Orange, solidifying his expertise in Bitcoin education and adoption. In addition to his advocacy work, he is also writing a book that explores Bitcoin’s potential in Africa, presenting it through African realities to resonate with and empower the continent’s youth.

Biography_ZH: 2010 年开始接触比特币，并在 2017 年起不再持有法币。他曾就职于 Northern Bitcoin、Lightning Labs、Swan 等公司，目前在 Musqet 全力专注推动商户端比特币支付落地。

Biography_ZH: Bill Qian 是全球知名的投资人、企业家和思想领袖，长期布局加密、人工智能和金融科技等前沿领域，累计投资规模超过 300 亿美元，助推多项颠覆性技术在全球落地。目前，他是 Cypher Capital 的联合创始人，这是一家专注区块链和 Web3 的多策略投资机构。此前，他曾担任币安的全球并购与 Binance Labs 负责人，管理过规模高达 250 亿美元的全球最大加密投资组合，并在京东负责金融科技和 AI 投资，服务的业务年 GMV 超过 4000 亿美元。除投资外，Bill 也积极倡导 AI、区块链和数字金融的融合，他通过播客《Where AI Meets Crypto, Technology Meets Humanity, and East Meets West》与全球顶级行业嘉宾探讨最新趋势。
Biography_EN: Bill Qian – Founder, Investor, & Thought LeaderBill Qian is a global investor, entrepreneur, and thought leader shaping the future of crypto, AI, and fintech. With a track record of over $30 billion in investments, he has played a key role in backing and scaling transformative technologies worldwide.Currently, Bill is the Co-Founder of Cypher Capital, a leading multi-strategy investment firm focused on blockchain and Web3.Previously, Bill was the Global Head of M&A and Binance Labs at Binance, where he managed the world's largest crypto investment portfolio at the time—$25 billion. Prior to that, he led fintech and AI investments at JD.com, overseeing investments in a business that generated over $400 billion in gross merchandise volume (GMV).Beyond investing, Bill is a passionate advocate for the convergence of AI, blockchain, and digital finance. He shares insights through his podcast, “Where AI Meets Crypto, Technology Meets Humanity, and East Meets West,” featuring top industry voices on emerging trends.

Biography_ZH: Brandon 是 BTC Inc. 的 CEO，自 2017 年加入以来，他在公司担任过总经理、幕僚长和活动负责人等关键职务，帮助比特币大会品牌从美国扩展到阿姆斯特丹、香港和阿布扎比等全球城市。
Biography_EN: Brandon is CEO of BTC Inc. Since joining the Company in 2017, Green has been a core member of BTC Inc, holding a variety of leadership roles including Managing Director, Chief of Staff, and Head of Events. During his tenure, he has helped drive the global expansion of the Bitcoin Conference franchise beyond the United States to Amsterdam, Hong Kong, and Abu Dhabi.

Biography_ZH: Brett Tejpaul 是 Coinbase Institutional 的联席 CEO，带领团队为机构投资者打造值得信赖的加密桥梁，在托管、专业交易与综合服务等方面开拓产品与功能，推动全球机构采用数字资产。他曾在巴克莱担任全球销售主管，并在摩根大通担任高级管理职务，兼具传统金融市场与加密创新经验，拥有波士顿学院理学学士学位。
Biography_EN: Brett Tejpaul serves as Co-CEO of Coinbase Institutional, leading Coinbase’s efforts to build a trusted bridge for institutions expanding their crypto strategies. In this role, he spearheads the growth of the institutional client base, develops sophisticated features and services tailored to institutional investors, and drives industry-wide education and innovation on digital assets.Brett brings deep expertise from traditional finance, having previously served as Global Head of Sales at Barclays and held senior leadership positions at JP Morgan. His unique combination of institutional markets experience and global crypto innovation enables him to deliver integrated solutions that seamlessly connect custody, advanced trading platforms, and prime services for the world's leading institutions.Brett holds a Bachelor of Science degree from Boston College.

Biography_ZH: Brian 是 Off the Chain Capital 的 CEO，这是一家采用“巴菲特式价值投资”策略、专注折价收购区块链资产的基金。他自 2012 年进入比特币领域，著有四本关于比特币和前沿科技的书，并走访世界各地宣讲比特币技术与资产的重要性。
Biography_EN: Brian is the CEO of Off the Chain Capital, which is a Warren Buffet value-style investment firm focused on acquiring blockchain assets at a discount. He is the author of four books covering Bitcoin and advanced technology. He entered the Bitcoin space in 2012 and has traveled the world educating people on the importance of the technology and asset.

Biography_ZH: Brindon Mwiine 是 Bitcoin Kampala Uganda 的创始人，通过比特币教育、循环经济实践以及用聪支付教师薪资，推动比特币在乌干达的真实落地。他还是 Gorilla Sats 的联合创始人，将比特币与乌干达的探险旅游结合起来。
Biography_EN: Brindon Mwiine is the Founder of Bitcoin Kampala Uganda, driving real-world Bitcoin adoption in Uganda through Bitcoin education, circular-economy initiatives, and paying teachers in sats. He is also Co-Founder of Gorilla Sats, which fuses Bitcoin with adventure tourism across Uganda.

Biography_ZH: Bruce 是投资控股公司 Chainstone Labs 的 CEO，自 2013 年起全职投身比特币，当时曾担任比特币基金会执行董事，拥有超过 30 年金融与投资经验，也是注册投资顾问公司 Atlantic Financial 的拥有者。他是自由与自由市场的积极倡导者，曾在 2022 年竞选新罕布什尔州联邦参议员，并已连续 12 年主办 Satoshi Roundtable 闭门圆桌，汇聚比特币与金融科技生态中的创始人、CEO 与核心开发者。
Biography_EN: Bruce is CEO of the investment holding company Chainstone Labs. Bruce has been full time in Bitcoin since 2013 when he was Executive Director of the Bitcoin Foundation. He has over 30 years financial and investing experience and owns Atlantic Financial, a Registered Investment Advisor. Fenton is a liberty and free market advocate and ran for US Senate for New Hampshire in 2022. Fenton is the host of the Satoshi Roundtable, now in its 12th year, an annual event bringing together leading Founders, CEOs, and developers in the fintech and Bitcoin ecosystem.

Biography_ZH: Carl Runefelt 是知名的比特币最大主义者和企业家，凭借媒体影响力、投资布局和在加密领域的领导地位，致力于推动比特币的大规模采用，并鼓励他人以长期信念将比特币视作新金融时代的基石。
Biography_EN: Carl Runefelt is a prominent Bitcoin maximalist and entrepreneur who through his media presence, investments, and leadership in the crypto space - Promotes widespread Bitcoin adoption while encouraging others to adopt a long-term, conviction in Bitcoin as the foundation of the new financial era.

Biography_ZH: Carlos Estrada 是比特币企业家，创立了 Coin Vigilante，制作限量版比特币主题腕表，将“稀缺性、精密度和工作量证明”融入产品；他同时创立 Vigilante Media，为品牌提供全案营销与叙事策略，并领导 Venture Watches，在全球范围内为品牌和机构提供 B2B 腕表设计与生产服务。他的工作连接比特币、工艺与创业精神，强调健全货币、创造力与长期价值。
Biography_EN: Carlos Estrada is a Bitcoin entrepreneur and the founder of Coin Vigilante, a company creating limited-edition Bitcoin-inspired timepieces that embody scarcity, precision, and proof-of-work. He is also the founder of Vigilante Media, a full-service marketing agency helping brands grow through storytelling, creative strategy, and digital innovation. In addition, Carlos leads Venture Watches, a B2B watch manufacturing company that provides end-to-end design and production solutions for brands and organizations worldwide. His work connects the worlds of Bitcoin, craftsmanship, and entrepreneurship—driven by a belief in sound money, creativity, and building lasting value.

Biography_ZH: Carly Benson 是 Bitcoin Conference 的 VIP 与战略合作负责人，自 2021 年起运营 Whale Pass 体验。她在拉斯维加斯生活期间接触职业扑克与体育博彩圈，见证大额玩家如何多年使用比特币下注、结算和转账，从而在 2017 年成为一名“只持有比特币”的比特币人。在进入比特币领域之前，Carly 经营自己的市场咨询公司长达 18 年，并以“无酒精生活专家”、课程作者和瑜伽导师为人熟知，她的演讲与课程帮助成千上万人调整与酒精的关系，并曾登上《Women’s Health》《SELF》杂志、Extra TV、Travel Zoo 等媒体。
Biography_EN: Carly Benson is the Head of VIP & Strategic Partnerships for the Bitcoin Conference and has been running the Whale Pass experience since 2021.Carly became a Bitcoin-only Bitcoiner in 2017 after living in Las Vegas and interacting with the professional poker and sports betting community. She learned about Bitcoin by seeing use-cases for it as the whales of the gambling world have been betting, settling and transacting in BTC for many years.Before getting in to the Bitcoin space, Carly ran her own successful marketing consultancy for 18 years and was known as an alcohol-free SME, Course Creator and Yoga Instructor.She has given talks around the world and her work and courses have helped thousands change their relationship with alcohol. She’s been featured in Women’s Health, SELF magazine, Extra TV, Travel Zoo and other notable outlets.

Biography_ZH: Charlene Fadirepo 是 Mango Digital Strategies 的创始人兼 CEO，这是一家专注比特币教育与咨询的公司，帮助金融专业人士和使命驱动型机构释放比特币与数字资产的潜力。凭借 15 年以上在金融、监管与创新战略方面的经验，她为企业客户提供咨询，从财务管理优化到业务实践及比特币挖矿探索。她为金融从业者打造了课程 BitcoinTreasuryCourse.com，并著有《The Bitcoin Leap: How Bitcoin Is Transforming Africa》，本科就读于弗吉尼亚大学电气工程专业，并在杜克大学富卡商学院取得 MBA。
Biography_EN: Charlene Fadirepo is the founder and CEO of Mango Digital Strategies, a Bitcoin education and consulting firm dedicated to helping finance professionals and mission-driven organizations unlock the potential of Bitcoin and digital assets. With 15+ years of expertise in finance, regulation, and strategic innovation, Charlene has guided corporate clients in integrating Bitcoin into their business models—whether through treasury management optimization, business practices, or exploring Bitcoin mining opportunities. Charlene is the creator of the popular course for finance professionals, BitcoinTreasuryCourse.com. Charlene is also the author of The Bitcoin Leap: How Bitcoin Is Transforming Africa. Charlene studied Electrical Engineering at the University of Virginia and earned a Masters In Business Administration from The Fuqua School of Business at Duke University.

Biography_ZH: Charlie Hu 是资深加密企业家与投资人，2013 年买入第一枚比特币，此后长期在 Polkadot、Tezos 和 Polygon 担任重要职位，是比特币 DeFi 与扩容的积极推动者，认为比特币生态仍有巨大流动性释放空间。他目前是 Bitlayer 联合创始人，这是一条通过 YBTC 和 BitVM 技术为比特币 DeFi 提供动力的比特币二层，被视作第三代跨链与扩展解决方案。Charlie 也是活跃的公众演讲者，曾在韩国区块链周、Bitcoin Nashville、Bitcoin Asia、Consensus 等大会发表演讲，并多次被 Cointelegraph、CoinDesk、Bitcoin.com、福布斯等媒体报道。作为东西方“超级连接者”，他在亚洲散户社群与美国机构和大资金之间不断创造合作机会。
Biography_EN: Charlie Hu is an entrepreneur and investor with a long tenure in the crypto space. He bought his first bitcoin in 2013 and since then he has been actively involved in the crypto spaces holding key positions in Polkadot, Tezos and Polygon.He is an active proponent of Bitcoin DeFi and scalability, believing that the largest liquidity unlock potential remains to be seen.Currently he is the the Cofounder of Bitlayer, a Bitcoin Layer 2 supercharging BitcoinDefi through YBTC and BitVM technology, a third generation bridging solution.Charlie is an active public speaker having participated in panels and delivering keynotes participated in Korea Blockchain Week, Bitcoin Nashville, Bitcoin Asia, Consensus. He is regularly featured in top media such as Cointelegraph, Coindesk, Bitcoin.com, Forbes amongst others.He is also a key connector between east and west unlocking opportunities between Asia retail communities and large investors and institutions in the US.

Biography_ZH: 他于 2013 年在 Silvergate Bank 工作时开始接触比特币，过去 12 年一直在比特币、数字资产与美国商业银行交汇处工作，深耕“银行 × 比特币”的实务一线。

Title_ZH: Managing Director, Head of Blockchain and Digital Assets
Title_EN: Managing Director, Head of Blockchain and Digital Assets
Biography_ZH: Christian 的职业生涯扎根于金融科技与金融服务，形成了在并购、风投、资本市场、SPAC 和私募融资等领域的综合专长，他关注健全货币及其对金融生态的深远影响。目前，Christian 担任 Cohen & Company Capital Markets 的董事总经理、区块链和数字资产负责人，此前曾在 Broadhaven Capital Partners 专注 FinTech 与区块链公司的并购与融资咨询，在 Guggenheim Securities 覆盖金融科技、银行、保险和特色金融，并对区块链创新保持高度兴趣。他拥有哥伦比亚商学院 MBA 学位和伊利诺伊大学厄本纳-香槟分校学士学位。
Biography_EN: Christian has dedicated his career to the Fintech and financial services sectors, developing a unique expertise in M&A, venture capital, capital markets, SPAC, and private placement transactions. His passion for sound money and its transformative impact on the financial ecosystem drives his work.Currently, Christian is Managing Director, Head of Blockchain and Digital Assets at Cohen & Company Capital Markets. Previously, he served as Vice President at Broadhaven Capital Partners, providing M&A and private placement advisory services to blockchain and Fintech companies. Before that, he was an Associate at Guggenheim Securities, covering Fintech, Banks, Insurance, and Specialty Finance, with a keen interest in blockchain innovations.Christian holds an MBA from Columbia Business School and a BS from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign.

Biography_ZH: Chris 长期为银行、政府和科技公司打造金融服务与投资平台，目前担任阿联酋数字优先伊斯兰社区银行 ruya 的 CEO，通过合乎教义的伊斯兰银行实践、一流客户服务和社区参与，致力于构建更公平、更可持续的金融世界。在此之前，他是 G42 合资公司 COO，从孵化阶段开始搭建业务单元，并负责运营企业资产组合与自有投资计划；在阿布扎比投资办公室（ADIO）任职期间，则帮助阿布扎比跻身全球投资版图的重要中心。他还曾在阿联酋国民银行（Emirates NBD）领导私人银行、资管与零售银行的战略和客户体验团队，使其私人银行业务成长为区域领先财富管理品牌。职业早期，他在罗兰贝格重组团队以及大型可再生能源集团的企业发展与并购部门工作。
Biography_EN: Chris has been building financial services and investment platforms for banks, governments and technology companies. He is currently serving as the CEO of ruya, the UAE’s digital-first Islamic community bank. Under his leadership, ruya is dedicated to creating a fairer and more sustainable world through ethical Islamic banking practices, exceptional customer service and active community engagement.Before his role at ruya, Chris served as the Chief Operating Officer at a G42 joint venture, where he was responsible for building the business unit from its incubation phase. He also led the asset management of the group's portfolio of operating businesses and developed its proprietary investment programme.Prior to G42, Chris was a key member of the executive management team at the Abu Dhabi Investment Office (ADIO). His leadership and strategic vision were vital in positioning Abu Dhabi as a significant player on the global investment stage.At Emirates NBD, Chris led award-winning strategy and customer experience teams across Private Banking, Asset Management and Retail Banking. His tenure saw Emirates NBD's Private Banking business rise to prominence as the leading wealth management franchise in the region.Chris's career began at Roland Berger’s restructuring and turnaround practice as well as the corporate development and M&A team at a major renewable energy conglomerate.

Biography_ZH: Clarisse Hagège 是 Dfns 的 CEO，这是一家专注数字资产安全的钱包基础设施公司，为比特币等多链网络提供先进的托管与密钥管理方案，致力于搭建安全、可编程的资产托管与交易“底层轨道”。她亦担任 MPC Alliance 董事会成员，并在 Techstars Web3 Launchpad 和 Station F 为早期加密创业者提供辅导，帮助传统金融与去中心化系统之间搭建桥梁。创立 Dfns 之前，Clarisse 分别在索邦大学、巴黎政治学院和多菲纳大学学习地缘政治与历史、金融以及应用经济学，并在高盛、美林和农业信贷投行工作十年，期间成为集团最年轻的 CEO 办公室主任之一，主导研究、全球覆盖与能源创新相关项目。如今，她将重心放在推动比特币机构级采用与安全自托管基础设施的全球普及，常年往返于纽约和巴黎，与伴侣 Christopher 及两个孩子一同生活。
Biography_EN: Clarisse Hagège is the CEO of Dfns, a cybersecurity company securing Bitcoin and digital assets through advanced wallet infrastructure. Her work focuses on building the cryptographic and institutional rails that enable safe, programmable custody and transaction flows across Bitcoin and other blockchain networks.Beyond Dfns, Clarisse serves on the board of the MPC Alliance, mentors founders through Techstars Web3 Launchpad, and advises early-stage crypto startups at Station F, helping bridge traditional finance and decentralized systems.Before founding Dfns, Clarisse earned degrees in Geopolitics and History (Sorbonne), Finance (Sciences Po), and Applied Economics (Dauphine University). She spent a decade in investment banking at Goldman Sachs, Merrill Lynch, and Crédit Agricole CIB, where she became the youngest Chief of Staff to the CEO and led initiatives in research, global coverage, and energy innovation.Today, Clarisse is deeply engaged in expanding Bitcoin’s institutional adoption and ensuring secure, global access to self-custody infrastructure. She lives between New York and Paris with her partner, Christopher, and their two children.

Biography_ZH: Cody Carbone 是 The Digital Chamber 的 CEO，这是一家全球最大、最具公信力的数字资产与区块链行业贸易协会，在快速演变的数字资产领域为政策制定者、监管机构和业界领袖提供权威参考与协作平台。协会拥有 200 多家成员，从比特币矿企、加密交易所到金融机构和财富 500 强企业，覆盖整个数字经济。作为华盛顿特区的核心声音，The Digital Chamber 主导美国联邦层面的教育与倡导工作，参与立法起草、监管框架设计，并推动两党合作，确保美国在数字创新中保持领先。Cody 亲自统筹与国会及特朗普政府的沟通，为关键数字资产立法提供洞见与解决方案。加入协会前，他在安永公共政策办公室负责金融服务与前沿科技的联邦游说，也曾在美国众议院与参议院担任政策工作人员。他拥有雪城大学法学博士（JD）与公共管理硕士（MPA）学位，是纽约州执业律师，常住华盛顿特区。
Biography_EN: Cody Carbone is the CEO of The Digital Chamber, the world’s largest and most trusted trade association representing the digital asset and blockchain industry. Under Cody’s leadership, The Digital Chamber serves as the go-to resource for policymakers, regulators, and industry leaders seeking clarity and collaboration in the rapidly evolving world of digital assets.With over 200 members spanning the entire digital economy—from bitcoin miners and crypto exchanges to financial institutions and Fortune 500 companies—The Chamber plays a central role in shaping the future of Web3 policy. As the premier voice in Washington, The Chamber leads federal education and advocacy efforts, crafting legislation, informing regulatory frameworks, and building bipartisan coalitions to ensure the United States remains a global hub for digital innovation.Cody personally oversees the Chamber’s engagement with Congress and the Trump administration, offering insight and policy solutions that reflect the diverse and rapidly growing digital asset ecosystem. His efforts have helped influence the most consequential digital asset legislation in the U.S..Prior to joining The Digital Chamber, Cody spent six years at Ernst & Young’s (EY) Office of Public Policy, where he led federal advocacy on financial services and emerging technologies. He also brings significant legislative experience, having served as policy staff in both the U.S. House of Representatives and U.S. Senate.Cody holds a Juris Doctor (JD) and a Master of Public Administration (MPA) from Syracuse University and is admitted to the New York State Bar. He resides in Washington, D.C., where he continues to champion smart, innovation-forward policies for the digital future.

Biography_ZH: Daniel Batten 是企业家和风投，因用数据驱动的研究挑战“比特币能源叙事”而在业内崭露头角。随着讨论的演变，他将注意力转向探索比特币的人道主义价值以及其作为大型机构资产负债表资产的适用性。
Biography_EN: Daniel Batten is an entrepreneur and venture capitalist who become a significant voice in the Bitcoin space mainly through his data-driven approach to challenging common energy narratives.As these narratives have evolved he has pivoted attention to investigating the humanitarian value of Bitcoin, and its suitability on the balance sheet of large institutional capital

Biography_ZH: Daniel 是新近成立的 mgmt Digital Infrastructure Fund 的 CEO，该基金聚焦在电价低廉、能源闲置或被限发地区部署比特币挖矿，并通过电网调节与热能回收等附加收入模式提升挖矿收益，首先布局北欧，逐步扩展至全欧洲。他自 2017 年起即是矿工，先后创立并领导 Greenblocks（比特币挖矿公司）和 Viska Digital Assets（冰岛首家数字资产对冲基金），也是活跃的天使投资人。作为一个坚信工作量证明与“做难事”的践行者，他能卧推 150 公斤、硬拉 221 公斤。
Biography_EN: Daniel is the CEO of newly launched mgmt Digital Infrastructure Fund, a fund focused on bitcoin mining where energy is low cost, stranded or curtailed and leveraging mining with additional revenue streams such as grid balancing and heat reuse in the Nordics and eventually throughout Europe.A passionate miner since 2017, Daniel has been active in the industry founding and leading companies such as Greenblocks, a bitcoin mining company and Viska Digital Assets, Iceland's first digital asset focused hedge fund.Daniel has been an active angel investor in recent years.As a firm believer in proof of work and doing hard things, Daniel can bench press 150kg and deadlift 221kg.

Biography_ZH: 他曾是房地产经纪人与企业家，在 2020 年末认真投身比特币，并于 2021 年初创建 Twitter 账号“Bitcoin Gandalf”，三年间将粉丝从 0 做到 8 万。他在 2021–2023 年期间在比特币挖矿公司 Braiins 负责市场工作，如今在撰写比特币内容的同时，通过代写和个人品牌策略咨询，帮助他人提升主权意识并建立个人品牌。
Biography_EN: I'm a former real estate broker and entrepreneur turned bitcoiner. I got seriously into bitcoin at the end of 2020. In early 2021, I started the Bitcoin Gandalf Twitter account and grew it from 0-80,000 followers in 3 years. I also worked in marketing at bitcoin mining company Braiins from 2021-2023. In addition to writing about bitcoin, I'm also focused on helping people become more sovereign by building their personal brands through my ghostwriting and personal branding strategy consulting services.

Biography_ZH: Prenetics（纳斯达克代码：PRE）是一家全球健康科技与长寿公司，开创“健康 + 财富”双引擎战略：一方面打造变革性的健康品牌，另一方面累积前瞻性的公司级比特币国库。其明星品牌 IM8 由公司与 David Beckham 联合创立，仅用 11 个月就实现 1 亿美元年经常性收入（ARR），成为史上最快突破该规模的保健品公司，增速甚至超过部分领先 AI 企业。IM8 预计在 2026 年底前将 ARR 提升至 3 亿美元，驱动力来自全球扩张、扎实的临床验证与顶级科学顾问委员会。在财富引擎方面，截至 11 月 19 日，Prenetics 持有 495 枚比特币，并以“每天增持 1 枚比特币”的节奏持续买入，体现出公司对长期财务韧性、不对称收益以及“同时延长寿命与巩固财务健康”的战略承诺。
Biography_EN: Prenetics (Nasdaq: PRE) is a global health-tech and longevity company pioneering a dual-engine “Health + Wealth” strategy—building a transformative wellness brand while simultaneously accumulating one of the world’s most forward-leaning corporate Bitcoin treasuries.Its flagship brand IM8, co-founded with David Beckham, has become a category-defining force—achieving US$100M ARR in only 11 months, making it the fastest supplement company in history to reach this scale, even surpassing the growth trajectories of leading AI companies. IM8 is now projected to reach US$300M ARR by the end of 2026, powered by global expansion, strong clinical validation, and a world-class scientific advisory board.On the wealth engine, as of November 19, Prenetics holds 495 BTC and is acquiring 1 BTC per day, underscoring its commitment to long-term financial resilience, asymmetric upside, and a future where companies invest not only in extending lifespan, but also in strengthening financial health for decades to come.

Biography_ZH: Darius 是 FTI Consulting 的董事总经理，为跨国企业和机构基金提供市场传播、Go-to-Market 与增长策略咨询，特别是在阿联酋协助多家全球科技、金融科技与数字资产公司成功落地。加入 FTI 前，他曾在风投和金融科技创业领域深度参与公司建设。
Biography_EN: Darius is Managing Director at FTI Consulting. He advises multinationals and institutional funds on marcomms, GTM and growth strategy, having launched into the UAE many leading global technology, fintech and digital assets firms. Prior to FTI, Darius was in venture capital and fintech company building.

Biography_ZH: David Ripley 自 2024 年 10 月起担任 Kraken 联席 CEO，此前自 2016 年 10 月至 2023 年 4 月任首席运营官，并在 2023 年 4 月至 2024 年 10 月期间出任 CEO。在加入 Kraken 前，他是 Glidera 的联合创始人兼 CEO，这是一家非托管钱包与入金服务商，于 2016 年被 Kraken 收购。他早年曾在波士顿咨询集团担任顾问，服务科技与金融服务等多个行业，并在 Syclo（移动企业软件公司）担任软件工程与产品管理职务。David 拥有伊利诺伊大学厄本纳-香槟分校电气工程学士学位和西北大学凯洛格管理学院 MBA。
Biography_EN: David Ripley has served as Kraken's Co-Chief Executive Officer since October 2024. He previously served as Kraken's Chief Operating Officer from October 2016 to April 2023 and Chief Executive Officer from April 2023 to October 2024.Prior to joining Kraken, Mr. Ripley was the Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Glidera, a non-custodial wallet and funding service provider that was acquired by Kraken in 2016.Mr. Ripley previously held roles in consulting at The Boston Consulting Group, where he advised clients across multiple industries, including technology and financial services. Earlier in his career, he also held management positions in software engineering and product management at Syclo, a mobile enterprise software company. Mr. Ripley holds a B.S. in Electrical Engineering from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and an M.B.A. from the Kellogg School of Management at Northwestern University.

Biography_ZH: 作为 BTC Inc. 的联合创始人兼 CEO，David Bailey 是去中心化未来的重要布道者。自 2013 年以来，BTC Inc. 为比特币生态提供情报服务、品牌建设和技术孵化，打造了《Bitcoin Magazine》、Bitcoin 2022 大会和 Carrot 等标志性项目，并在多个国家设立业务。Bailey 曾任 402 Digital Partners 管理合伙人（早期比特币基金之一），现为 UTXO Management 普通合伙人，也是比特币生态的活跃天使投资人，并在阿拉巴马大学顾问委员会任职。
Biography_EN: As the co-founder and chief executive officer of BTC Inc., David Bailey is an industry leader and evangelist for the decentralized future. Since 2013, BTC Inc has grown to offer critical intelligence, brand-building expertise and technical incubation specialized for the Bitcoin ecosystem, as well as industry-leading projects like Bitcoin Magazine, the Bitcoin 2022 conference, and Carrot. The company now operates in multiple countries and its brands are quickly becoming household names. Bailey sits on the board of advisors for the University of Alabama. He was managing partner at 402 Digital Partners, which is one of the earliest Bitcoin funds. He is currently general partner of UTXO Management; and is an active angel investor in the Bitcoin ecosystem.

Biography_ZH: Davinci Jeremie 是比特币教育者与企业家，致力于让加密世界简单易懂、便于实践。他运营 B4B（Bitcoin for Beginners）项目，举办线下工作坊与一对一辅导，提供关于购买、保管与使用比特币及闪电网络的清晰操作指引，着重强调私钥托管、助记词安全与建立新手使用比特币的信心。
Biography_EN: Davinci Jeremie is a Bitcoin educator and entrepreneur dedicated to making crypto simple and practical. He runs the B4B (Bitcoin for Beginners) program, hosts live workshops and mentorships, and produces clear, hands-on guidance on buying, securing and using Bitcoin and Lightning. His teaching focuses on real-world custody, seed security and helping newcomers build confidence with crypto.

Biography_ZH: Denny 现任 Hash House 商务拓展副总裁，负责业务发展、销售与项目管理，在浸没式与水冷解决方案及电力硬件方面推动业务增长与运营卓越。在此之前，他曾在 Novablock、Poolin 与 Luxor 任职，积累了矿池、固件、托管运营与设备融资等多条业务线的经验。
Biography_EN: Denny is currently the VP of Business Development at Hash House, where he leads business development, sales, and project management, driving growth and operational excellence across immersion and hydro cooling solutions and electrical hardware solutions.Prior to Hash House, Denny held key roles at Novablock, Poolin, and Luxor, where he developed expertise across multiple business verticals, including mining pool, firmware, hosting operations, and equipment financing.

Title_ZH: Antalpha's COO and CEO of Americas & EMEA
Title_EN: Antalpha's COO and CEO of Americas & EMEA
Biography_ZH: Derar Islim 博士是 Antalpha Platform Holding Company 的首席运营官，同时担任美洲与欧洲中东非区域 CEO，是一位在数字资产行业深耕多年的资深金融高管，擅长全球范围内构建与管理数字资产金融服务与产品。其职业生涯兼具学术严谨与高压金融环境的实战经验，尤其在 Genesis 任临时 CEO 与 COO 期间，在危机时刻展现了卓越的执行与治理能力。此前，他在 Hard Yaka 负责风险管理，在美国银行美林担任高级交易员，联合管理 FVA（资金估值调整）交易台，并从事信用结构化产品的建模、定价与对冲工作。Derar 拥有佛罗里达州立大学金融数学博士学位，研究方向为金融衍生品与应用偏微分方程，是富布赖特学者并获得多项学术与职业荣誉。
Biography_EN: Derar Islim, Ph.D. – Chief Operating Officer, Antalpha Platform Holding Company and CEO, Americas & EMEADerar Islim, PhD, is a seasoned financial executive with significant experience in the digital asset industry, building and managing premier digital assets financial services and products globally. Islim’s career reflects a blend of academic rigor and practical experience in high-stakes financial environments. Derar’s leadership at Genesis, particularly during its crisis, showcased his ability to navigate complex operational and financial challenges from execution and governance perspectives.Derar formerly held the roles of Interim CEO and COO at Genesis and, prior to that, Head of Risk at Hard Yaka. He has an established track record of leading at the forefront of modern financial markets. Early in his career, he served as a senior trader at Bank of America Merrill Lynch, where he co-managed the Funding Valuation Adjustment (FVA) trading desk and worked on modeling, pricing, and hedging credit structured products.Derar holds a Ph.D. in Financial Mathematics from Florida State University, focusing on financial derivatives and applied partial differential equations.Derar is a recipient of the prestigious Fulbright Scholarship, alongside other academic and professional awards.

Biography_ZH: Eli 是 StarkWare 的联合创始人兼 CEO，也是公司董事会主席。他自 2001 年在希伯来大学取得理论计算机科学博士学位以来，一直致力于密码学与零知识证明的研究，是 STARK、FRI 和 Zerocash 等协议的共同发明人，并曾担任 Zcash 公司的创始科学家。他曾在普林斯顿高等研究院、哈佛与 MIT 进行研究工作，后在以色列理工学院任计算机科学教授，之后离职创立 StarkWare。
Biography_EN: Eli is a co-founder and CEO of StarkWare, and Chairman of its Board of Directors.He has been researching cryptographic and zero knowledge proofs of computational integrity ever since he received his Phd in Theoretical Computer Science from the Hebrew University in 2001. Eli is a co-inventor of the STARK, FRI and Zerocash protocols and a Founding Scientist of the Zcash Company. Over the years he held research positions at the Institute for Advanced Study at Princeton, Harvard and MIT, and, most recently, was a Professor of CS at Technion, which he left to co-found StarkWare.

Biography_ZH: Eric Yakes 是 Epoch 的创始人与管理合伙人，这是一家专注比特币基础设施的风投公司。他曾在困境私募股权收购领域工作，后转向比特币，著有畅销新书《The 7th Property》，系统阐述比特币的货币属性。作为 CFA 持证人，他的研究与写作为金融界解释比特币这一资产的革命性投资特征，并作为非营利组织 The Space 的创始成员与董事长，在丹佛推动经济与比特币教育。
Biography_EN: Eric Yakes is the Founder and Managing Partner of Epoch - a bitcoin infrastructure focused venture capital firm. He left the world of distressed private equity buyouts to join the bitcoin revolution by authoring The 7th Property - a best selling new release and internationally published book on bitcoin. As a CFA charter holder, his thought leadership is focused on the financial community helping them understand the revolutionary investment characteristics of bitcoin. Eric is a founding member and board Chairman of The Space - a Denver based non-profit educating the masses on economics and bitcoin.

Biography_ZH: Erik Hersman 是 Gridless 的联合创始人兼 CEO，公司在非洲建设由比特币挖矿驱动与稳定的可再生能源微电网，目前已在肯尼亚、马拉维和赞比亚等地落地项目，将原本闲置或浪费的可再生电力，转化为当地社区可负担的用电与收入。作为资深科技企业家和基础设施建设者，他用实际案例展示比特币如何成为推动撒哈拉以南非洲电气化、经济包容与能源韧性的催化剂。
Biography_EN: Erik Hersman is the CEO and co-founder of Gridless, a company building renewable energy mini-grids across Africa powered and stabilized by Bitcoin mining. Through projects in Kenya, Malawi, and Zambia, Gridless turns stranded or excess renewable power into productive local electricity and income for rural communities. A longtime technology entrepreneur and infrastructure builder, Erik’s work demonstrates how Bitcoin can be a catalyst for electrification, economic inclusion, and energy resilience across the continent.

Biography_ZH: Erik LaPaglia 是天使投资人、连续创业者和顾问，曾在科技、地产、广告与金融等领域打造和重塑多家公司。作为 Miami NFT Week 联合创始人及多家机构的董事会成员，他深度参与连接创新与机构资本，在 Web3、代币化与传统金融交汇处搭建全球合作网络。他在 iConnections、SALT、NFT NYC、Bitcoin Conference 和 Benzinga 科技与金融大会等舞台上，分享从加密采用到地产科技与资本市场创新的洞见。
Biography_EN: Erik LaPaglia is an angel investor, serial entrepreneur, and advisor with a track record of building and revitalizing companies across technology, real estate, advertising, and finance. As co-founder of Miami NFT Week and a board member of multiple organizations, Erik has been deeply involved in bridging innovation with institutional capital, fostering global partnerships at the intersection of Web3, tokenization, and traditional finance.Known for his ability to identify emerging trends and unlock new growth opportunities, Erik has advised and invested in numerous ventures within the blockchain and real-world asset (RWA) tokenization space. He has shared the stage at premier events such as iConnections, SALT, NFT NYC, Bitcoin Conference, and the Benzinga Tech & Finance Conference, engaging audiences on topics ranging from crypto adoption to proptech and capital markets innovation.With a vast network that spans entrepreneurs, investors, and thought leaders, Erik brings a unique perspective on how technology can reshape industries and create scalable, lasting impact.

Biography_ZH: Faisal Saeed Al Mutar 是社会企业家与媒体高管，在经济发展、创新与领导力方面经验丰富。过去十多年，他在中东及更广区域推动大规模社会变革。作为 Ideas Beyond Borders 的创始人，他将该组织发展成阿拉伯世界（尤其是伊拉克）推进自由市场思想、创新与政策改革的重要平台。Faisal 与多边机构和私营部门合作，推动增长与创业，重点在多元社会中发掘结构性机遇，并通过改革减少官僚主义、创造就业、赋能企业。他曾在 TED 等全球舞台演讲，在美国与中东多地分享其在创新、反极端主义和地缘稳定领域的观点，并支持多家初创企业与青年领袖。因其贡献，他获得奥巴马总统颁发的总统志愿服务奖，并获加州惠提尔学院荣誉博士学位，常年往返纽约与中东，在全球视角与本地经验之间搭建桥梁。
Biography_EN: Faisal Saeed Al Mutar is a social entrepreneur and media executive with extensive experience in economic development, innovation, and leadership.Over the past decade, Faisal has driven large-scale change and fostered growth in the Middle East and beyond. As the founder of Ideas Beyond Borders, he has built the organization into a leading platform for advancing free market thought, innovation, and policy reform in the Arab world, particularly in Iraq.Al Mutar has collaborated with intergovernmental organizations and private-sector stakeholders to promote growth and entrepreneurship. His work focuses on identifying transformative opportunities in diverse societies and implementing actionable policies to create jobs, reduce bureaucracy, and empower businesses with the tools necessary to grow.A sought-after speaker and thought leader, Faisal has delivered talks on global platforms, including TED, and engaged with audiences across the U.S. and the Middle East. His expertise spans innovation, counter-extremism, and geopolitical stability. He also supports startups and aspiring leaders, helping empower the next generation of changemakers.Faisal received the President’s Volunteer Service Award from President Barack Obama and an honorary doctorate from Whittier College in California.Splitting his time between New York and the Middle East, Faisal blends global insights with local expertise, building bridges between cultures and advancing meaningful change.

Biography_ZH: Fin Creighton 是 Bitcoin Success School 的创始人，将比特币教育、主权理念与长期风险防护结合起来，帮助个人避免高昂错误、减少对第三方的依赖并掌控自己的未来。他主持的 Fin Creighton Podcast 每周更新，面向 Z 世代输出比特币教育内容。
Biography_EN: Fin Creighton is the founder of Bitcoin Success School. His work blends Bitcoin education, sovereignty, and long term protection, guiding individuals to avoid costly mistakes, remove trust in third parties, and take full control of their future. The Fin Creighton Podcast releases a weekly episode targeted for Gen Z Bitcoin Education.

Biography_ZH: George Mekhail 是 BTC Inc. 旗下“Bitcoin for Corporations”业务线的总经理，《I Am Not Your Bruh》作者以及《Thank God for Bitcoin》合著者。自 2017 年起，他一直是比特币的积极倡导者，利用其在营销、金融创新与社区建设方面的经验，帮助企业将比特币纳入战略规划，同时也倡导在家庭层面维系稳固的亲密关系。
Biography_EN: George Mekhail is the Managing Director of Bitcoin for Corporations at BTC Inc., author of I Am Not Your Bruh, and co-author of Thank God for Bitcoin. A passionate advocate for Bitcoin since 2017, George blends his experience in marketing, financial innovation, and community development to guide companies in thoughtfully integrating Bitcoin into their strategic operations, while also advocating for strong family dynamics at home.

Biography_ZH: 在 Hedgit 打造比特币金融服务的同时，他也在 21m 打造 Orange Hill 项目，推动比特币生态建设。自 2014 年开始挖矿，曾为给矿机散热而烧坏旧冰箱，并在 2016 年举办比特币线下聚会，经历了“Shitereum”浪潮后持续在学习曲线上前行，一边科普“一粒玉米”，一边建设、成长，并不断重复那句信条：Stack the sats（持续攒聪）。
Biography_EN: Building Bitcoin Financial Services @ HedgitWhile shaping the Orange Hill @ 21mStarted mining in 2014, burned down old refrigerator trying to cool a rig and hosted a Bitcoin meetup in 2016 then Shitereum happened. Since then been on the learning curve, educating about corn, building & growing while eternally repeating: Stack the sats.

Biography_ZH: Greg Carson 常在全球各大会议上发表关于数字资产投资和谈判技巧的演讲与课程，足迹遍布 Super Venture、怀俄明区块链峰会、CFC 圣莫里茨、Bitcoin 2021–2025、MCC、达沃斯及多场另类投资峰会，也曾回到母校沃顿商学院分享。他拥有十年科技创业经验、十年投行与战略咨询经验，如今正在完成自己在风投领域的第一个十年。其管理的 Humla Ventures 在风投回报中位居前列，被视为全球最具潜力的新锐管理人之一。业余时间，他是一位尽职的父亲、滑雪与运动爱好者、阅读与写作爱好者、舞蹈老师以及太极练习者。
Biography_EN: Greg Carson is a frequent contributor, lecturer and speaker on events about investing in the digital asset ecosystem and negotiation technique. He has spoken on these subjects at several global conferences including Super Venture, Wyoming Blockchain Symposium, CFC St Moritz, Bitcoin 2021-2025, MCC, Davos, Uncorrelated Alts, Horizon events and even at his Alma Mater, the Wharton School of Business. Greg has a decade as a tech founder, a decade of experience in investment banking and strategy, and is rounding out his first decade in venture capital. Humla Ventures operates in the top decile of venture returns and is one of the top global emerging managers in the space. Greg is a dedicated father snowboarder, sportsman, reader/writer, dance teacher and tai chi.

Biography_ZH: 英国籍，比驻阿联酋已 10 年。由于过去在本地区参加加密活动体验不佳，Gregg 在 2022 年主动联系 BTC Inc，希望把 Bitcoin Conference 带到阿布扎比。借助 2024 年首届 Bitcoin MENA 大会的里程碑式成功作为跳板，他正筹备规模更大、规格更高的 Bitcoin MENA 2025，并推动《Bitcoin Magazine》、“Bitcoin for Corporations” 和 UTXO Management 落地海湾地区。职业上是游艇船长，本性则是一名比特币人。
Biography_EN: UK national, based in the UAE for 10 years. Having attended and had poor experiences at crypto events in the region, Gregg reached out to BTC Inc in 2022 to bring the Bitcoin Conference to Abu Dhabi. Using the landmark success of the inaugural Bitcoin MENA conference in 2024 as a launchpad, Gregg is now working on a bigger and better Bitcoin MENA 2025 along with launching Bitcoin Magazine, Bitcoin for Corporations and UTXO Managment into the GCC region. Yacht Captain by trade, Bitcoiner by nature.

Biography_ZH: Haider Rafique 是 OKX 的全球管理合伙人兼首席营销官，负责政府与投资者关系、市场营销和品牌合作，在加密行业关键转折期主导 OKX 与全球监管机构、投资人和关键利益相关方的互动。他是 OKX 品牌的创造者，主导其成长为全球知名平台，并参与打造 OKX 统一加密超级 App。在加入 OKX 之前，他推动 blockchain.info 重塑为 blockchain.com，使其成为领先的数字资产平台；还曾在 Okcoin 等头部加密公司担任高级市场与增长岗位，显著拉动零售用户增长。Haider 的经验横跨传统广告行业、全球代理公司以及微软等科技巨头。
Biography_EN: Haider Rafique is the Global Managing Partner and Chief Marketing Officer at OKX, where he oversees government and investor relations, marketing, and brand partnerships. He plays a central role in shaping OKX’s engagement with global regulators, investors, and key stakeholders during a pivotal time for the cryptocurrency industry. Haider is also the creator of the OKX brand, and led its transformation into a globally recognized platform and was a key contributor developing the OKX app as a unified crypto super app.Prior to joining OKX, he led the rebranding and growth of blockchain.info into blockchain.com, one of the leading digital asset platforms. He has held senior marketing and growth roles at major crypto firms, including Okcoin, where he drove significant retail user growth. Haider’s experience spans traditional advertising with global agencies and technology companies such as Microsoft.

Biography_ZH: 在创立 Soter Insure 之前，Henson 曾担任迪拜虚拟资产监管局（VARA）的首任 CEO，再之前是 Komainu 的总裁兼代理 CEO。Komainu 是 Nomura 与 CoinShares、Ledger 联合发起的机构级数字资产托管机构。
Biography_EN: Prior to launching Soter Insure, Henson was the first CEO of the Virtual Asset Regulator Authority in Dubai (VARA), and prior to that he was President and Acting CEO of Komainu, an institutional grade digital asset custodian, launched out of Nomura Securities in collaboration with Coinshares and Ledger.
