Biography_ZH: Hicham Chahine 是 NIP Group（纳斯达克代码 NIPG）的联合创始人兼联席 CEO，正带领公司高速扩展比特币挖矿和数字基础设施业务。在他的领导下，NIPG 用不到六个月的时间将比特币算力从零提升到 11.3 EH/s，成为全球成长最快的上市矿企之一，也是 MENA 地区规模最大的矿企。在布局数字基础设施之前，他于 2016 年收购电竞战队 Ninjas in Pyjamas，并将其打造成拥有数亿粉丝的全球游戏与娱乐品牌。Hicham 具备金融与创业背景，2008–2016 年在北欧最大财富管理机构 Formue 负责对冲基金投资，2010 年又创立专注生活方式、游戏与科技投资的私募机构 Diglife AS。他常驻阿布扎比，NIPG 与阿布扎比投资办公室建立了战略合作框架，并持有挪威 BI 商学院商业与经济学学士学位。
Biography_EN: Hicham Chahine is Co-Founder and Co-CEO of NIP Group (NASDAQ: NIPG), where he is leading the company's rapid expansion into Bitcoin mining and digital infrastructure. Under his leadership, NIPG scaled from zero to 11.3 EH/s of Bitcoin mining capacity in under six months, establishing the company as one of the fastest-growing public miners globally, and the largest in the MENA region.Prior to NIPG's digital infrastructure expansion, Hicham acquired the esports organization Ninjas in Pyjamas in 2016 and built it into a global gaming and entertainment platform reaching hundreds of millions of fans. His background spans finance and entrepreneurship - from 2008 to 2016, he directed hedge fund investments at Formue, the Nordic region's largest wealth management firm, and in 2010 founded Diglife AS, a private equity firm focused on lifestyle, gaming, and technology investments.Hicham brings a unique perspective to Bitcoin mining through his combination of financial markets experience, operational scale-up expertise, and deep understanding of digital communities and fan engagement. He is based in Abu Dhabi, where NIPG operates under a partnership framework with the Abu Dhabi Investment Office. He holds a bachelor's degree in business and economics from BI Norwegian Business School.

Biography_ZH: Hubertus 是 Bitcredit Protocol 的创始人，这是一套面向实体经济企业采用的“比特币弹性信用货币层”。他曾在商业银行、投行与电信业担任高管，过去二十年一直以独立连续创业者身份活跃在金融与 IT 交汇处，创办过在线券商、数字期权交易所以及全球预测市场平台。他还在维也纳哈耶克研究所主持每月一次的奥地利经济学沙龙。
Biography_EN: Hubertus is the Founder of Bitcredit Protocol, the elastic Bitcoin credit money layer for business adoption in the real economy. A former commercial banker, investment banker, and Telecom CEO, Hubertus has been an independent serial entrepreneur at the intersection of finance and IT for two decades, founding an online brokerage, a digital options exchange, and a global prediction market platform. He also hosts the monthly Austrian Economics Salon at Vienna's Hayek Institute.

Biography_ZH: Hunter 是 SALT Lending 的首席营收官，这是一家最早开展“比特币抵押贷款”的平台之一，同时也是即将出版的新书《The Bitcoin Advantage》的合著者。他受过系统工程训练，拥有弗吉尼亚大学优化与 AI 方向博士学位，曾在巴克莱、HBOS 和万事达卡担任高级领导职务，也创立和孵化多家初创企业，长期在欧美两地工作。Hunter 通过科罗拉多大学区块链联盟、IEEE 区块链项目和加密货币认证联盟（C4）深度参与比特币教育，并常在全球比特币大会上分享比特币抵押金融与金融主权的创新实践。
Biography_EN: Hunter is the Chief Revenue Officer of SALT Lending, one of the earliest Bitcoin-backed lending platforms, and co-author of the upcoming book - The Bitcoin Advantage. A systems engineer by training with a Ph.D. in optimization and AI from the University of Virginia, he has held senior leadership roles at global banks include Barclays, HBOS, and MasterCard, founded and advised multiple startups, and worked internationally across Europe and the U.S. Hunter has been active in Bitcoin education through the University of Colorado Blockchain Alliance, IEEE blockchain initiatives, and the CryptoCurrency Certification Consortium (C4), and he frequently speaks at global Bitcoin conferences on innovation in Bitcoin-backed finance and financial sovereignty.

Biography_ZH: Ian 是一位高管兼连续创业者，长期在中东和非洲为服务不足人群打造金融服务。目前他担任 Sumara Technology CEO，为大型金融机构主导数字化转型，Sumara 自建比特币国库并将其视为竞争优势。他曾任非洲第二快成长企业 Moniepoint 的首席产品官、CMC Markets 全球产品负责人，并共同创立阿联酋获奖金融科技公司 NOW Money，为中东 2600 万外来务工人员提供账户和基础金融服务。Ian 曾获 2019 年 ADGM 评选的“阿联酋年度金融科技企业家”，同时也是一名坚定的比特币支持者，专注为非洲和中东地区具有独特需求的人群设计比特币解决方案。
Biography_EN: Ian is an executive and serial entrepreneur, building businesses providing financial services to underserved groups in the Middle East and Africa. Ian is currently CEO of Sumara Technology, which undertakes digital transformation projects for large financial services firms. Sumara Technology has a Bitcoin treasury, and uses this as a competitive advantage.Former Chief Product Officer at Moniepoint, the second fastest growing company in Africa, Global Head of Product at CMC Markets, and co-founder of NOW Money, a multiple award winning UAE-based company that broke new ground by providing accounts and access to financial services for the 26 million migrant workers in the Middle East.Ian was UAE Fintech Entrepreneur of the Year 2019 (ADGM).Ian is an avid Bitcoiner, who is working on solutions that can bring the benefits of Bitcoin to populations in Africa and the Middle East, who have unique characteristics and needs from financial services which are often poorly understood by the West.

Biography_ZH: Irene 在数字货币挖矿领域拥有多年经验，负责比特大陆全球业务拓展，对高性能矿机与数据中心建设有深厚理解，是推动绿色挖矿与可再生能源接入的重要倡导者。
Biography_EN: Irene has years of experience in the digital currency mining space and is in charge of BITMAIN’s global business development. She is an expert on developing the mining ecosystem with vast knowledge of high-performance mining hardware and data center development. She is an advocate for renewable energy integration for green mining.

Biography_ZH: Irina Heaver 是常驻迪拜的资深比特币律师，自 2016 年起管理阿联酋首家专注比特币和加密资产的律所，曾代表多家行业龙头和创新项目。她为多国政府和监管机构提供政策与立法咨询，在制定比特币相关法律法规方面发挥关键作用。Irina 热衷于赋能有远见的创业者，帮助他们将创新想法落地；作为一名比特币人，她坚信货币应当与国家分离。
Biography_EN: Irina Heaver is a leading Bitcoin lawyer based in Dubai, managing the first UAE-based law firm exclusively dedicated to Bitcoin and Crypto since 2016. She has represented some of the industry’s most prominent companies and groundbreaking projects. Irina has also advised numerous governments and regulators, playing a key role in shaping emerging technology policies and drafting Bitcoin-specific laws and regulations. Passionate about empowering visionary startup founders, Irina is dedicated to helping them bring their innovative ideas to life. As a Bitcoiner, she firmly believes that money should be separated from the state.

Biography_ZH: JD Gagnon 是区块链企业家与战略顾问，横跨多个生态系统，近期专注 Core Network。作为 BITS（bits.financial）的创始人，他打造连接传统金融与 DeFi 的基础设施，为 BTC 和 wBTC 等资产提供具备机构级托管和跨链可组合性的真实收益策略。他也是 Rome Blockchain Labs 的联合创始人，这是一家专注 DeFi 创新的孵化器，以及 Avalanche 借贷协议 BENQI 的联合创始人，后者上线后 TVL 曾突破 40 亿美元。凭借在理财规划、商业咨询与数字战略方面的背景，JD 能够系统评估不同规模机构与项目面临的风险、监管与机遇。
Biography_EN: JD Gagnon is a blockchain entrepreneur and strategist with expertise across multiple ecosystems, most recently including the Core Network. As Founder of BITS (bits.financial), he develops infrastructure that bridges traditional finance and DeFi, supporting real-yield strategies with institutional-grade custody and cross-chain composability for assets like BTC and wBTC. A co-founder of Rome Blockchain Labs, an incubator focused on DeFi innovation, and BENQI, a lending protocol on Avalanche that reached $4B in TVL post-launch, JD has experience scaling protocols from early-stage development to enterprise adoption. His background in financial planning, business consulting, and digital strategy helps him address risks, regulations, and opportunities with institutions and projects of all sizes.

Biography_ZH: Jez Mohideen 博士是一位在传统金融与数字资产交汇处打造企业的创业者和金融创新者。作为 Laser Digital（野村集团数字金融部门）的联合创始人兼 CEO，他正构建涵盖交易、资管和风投的、受监管的机构级数字资产解决方案。他还共同创立了 Komainu（2018 年与野村联合发起的机构托管机构）以及 KAIO（原 Libre），专注于现实世界资产的代币化基础设施。在加入野村之前，Jez 曾是 Brevan Howard 的合伙人，主导系统化与 AI/ML 驱动的宏观交易策略，并在野村担任首席数字官和全球市场 EMEA 联合负责人，推动集团数字化转型。他拥有伦敦帝国理工学院过程系统工程博士学位和化学工程硕士学位，在全球资本市场和宏观交易领域有逾 30 年经验。
Biography_EN: Dr. Jez Mohideen is an accomplished entrepreneur and financial innovator, recognized for building businesses at the intersection of traditional finance and digital assets. As Co-Founder & CEO of Laser Digital — the digital finance arm of Nomura Group, he is leading thecreation of regulated, institutional-grade solutions across trading, asset management, and venture investment in the digital asset ecosystem.An entrepreneur at heart, Jez has co-founded and scaled ventures including Komainu, an institutional digital asset custodian launched with Nomura in 2018, and KAIO (formerly Libre), a pioneer in tokenisation infrastructure for real-world assets. Prior to Nomura, he was a partner at Brevan Howard, spearheading systematic and AI/ML-driven macro tradingstrategies.With over 30 years in global capital markets and macro trading, Jez also served as Nomura’s Chief Digital Officer and Co-Head of Global Markets EMEA, driving the firm’s digital transformation. He holds a PhD in Process Systems Engineering and a Master’s in Chemical Engineering from Imperial College London.

Biography_ZH: JP 研究比特币已 12 年，自 2018 年起共同创办并主持 Bitcoin Sydney，这是一个面向现有比特币人和公众的教育与社交社区。他也在其他社群做演讲，强调持有比特币的重要性。他关注的主题包括：比特币博弈论、比特币作为健全货币/储蓄科技、比特币卫星节点（他是澳大利亚首位运行此类节点的人）、为何比特币是唯一重要的区块链，以及比特币历史。
Biography_EN: JP has been studying Bitcoin for 12 years and from 2018, co-founded and hosts Bitcoin Sydney, an educational and social group focused on helping existing Bitcoiners and general public understand and get involved in this burgeoning ecosystem. He also presents talks to other community groups on the necessity of owning Bitcoin.His other topics of interest include Bitcoin Game Theory, Bitcoin as sound money/savings tech, Bitcoin satellite connected nodes (first to run one in Aus), Why Bitcoin is the only blockchain that matters, and Bitcoin history.

Biography_ZH: 作为 OVEX 的创始人兼 CEO，Jonathan Ovadia 站在非洲机构采用比特币的前沿。他拥有开普敦大学电气与计算机工程背景，将市场低效视为工程问题，带领 OVEX 成为非洲领先的数字资产结算与流动性基础设施平台。他通过为大型企业提供安全、高容量的支付通道，重塑比特币和稳定币在跨境贸易与企业财资结算中的角色，累积处理交易额已达数十亿美元。
Biography_EN: As the Founder and CEO of OVEX, Jonathan Ovadia is at the forefront of institutional Bitcoin adoption in Africa.With a strong background in Electrical and Computer Engineering from the University of Cape Town, Jonathan views market inefficiencies as engineering problems—and has built OVEX into the region's premier infrastructure for digital asset settlement and liquidity.Jonathan is widely recognized for democratizing access to global finance for the continent's largest enterprises. He has been instrumental in opening up institutional access to Bitcoin, establishing the secure, high-volume payment rails required for companies to use cryptocurrency as a real-time settlement layer for cross-border trade and corporate treasury management. Having processed billions in volume, Jonathan is re-defining the utility of Bitcoin and stablecoins for African commerce.

Title_EN: Chief Legal Officer and Head of Media
Biography_ZH: Joseph 是美国注册律师，2017 年创立 thecryptolawyers.com，这是一家“只做加密”的律所，曾代表多家行业头部机构。自 2020 年起，他在 Bitcoin.com 担任高管，负责媒体、法务与合规团队，并经常为 CoinDesk、Fortune、雅虎财经和 Cointelegraph 等媒体撰稿。
Biography_EN: Joseph is a licensed attorney in the U.S. and founder of thecryptolawyers.com (est. 2017), a crypto-only law firm where he represented top players in the industry. Joseph has been an executive at Bitcoin.com since 2020 and leads the media, legal and compliance teams. Joseph is also a regular contributor to various financial and crypto online publications such as Coindesk, Fortune, Yahoo Finance, and Cointelegraph.

Biography_ZH: Joseph Dallago 是 Rain 的联合创始人兼 CEO，Rain 是中东北非地区首家取得牌照、也是最大的一家本土加密货币交易所。他 13 岁开始写代码，创业十多年并完成两次退出后，于 2013 年进入加密领域，尤其深度参与中东地区的行业发展。在他的领导下，Rain 于 2017 年拿下巴林央行颁发的首个区域加密牌照，并于 2023 年获得阿布扎比全球市场（ADGM）牌照，平台注册用户超 100 万，从 Coinbase、Kleiner Perkins、Paradigm 等全球机构处累计融资 1.1 亿美元。他致力于扩大金融可达性，推动本地区负责任的加密采用。
Biography_EN: Joseph Dallago is the Co-Founder and CEO of Rain, the first licensed and largest region-born cryptocurrency exchange in the Middle East and North Africa. He began coding at age 13 and has spent more than a decade building technology companies, founding and exiting two startups before Rain. Joseph entered the crypto space in 2013 and has been closely involved in its evolution, particularly across the Middle East. Under his leadership, Rain secured the region’s first crypto license with the Central Bank of Bahrain in 2017 and expanded its regulatory footprint by obtaining an ADGM licence in 2023. Rain has since grown to more than one million sign-ups and raised 110 million USD from global investors including Coinbase, Kleiner Perkins, and Paradigm. Joseph remains focused on expanding financial access and driving responsible crypto adoption across the region.

Biography_ZH: 作为亚洲负责人，Kevin 将领导 Nakamoto（KindlyMD 子公司）在全球最重要、最具活力地区之一的比特币国库战略。他负责与各国政府、监管机构、交易所和上市公司建立关键关系，并进一步加强与机构投资人、主权基金和家族办公室的合作。Kevin 自 2014 年进入比特币挖矿与基础设施领域，曾任 Foundry Digital 业务发展与挖矿战略高级副总裁，主导部署北美最大矿机车队之一，并连续四年帮助 Foundry 建成全球算力最大的比特币矿池。在此之前，他担任 Greenidge Generation 首席挖矿官，将一座 106 兆瓦燃气电厂改造为首家联邦监管下的比特币挖矿电厂，为美国挖矿机构化铺路；更早时，他在 Bitcoin.com 负责挖矿业务运营，并在 2016 年共同创立 Project Spokane，将其打造成当时北美最大的比特币数据中心。
Biography_EN: As Head of Asia, Kevin will lead Nakamoto, which is a subsidiary of KindlyMD, Bitcoin treasury strategy across one of the world’s most important and dynamic regions. Kevin is responsible cultivating key relationships with governments, regulators, exchanges, and public companies, while also strengthening ties with institutional investors, sovereign funds, and family offices.Kevin first entered the Bitcoin space in 2014 and has spent the past decade at the forefront of mining and infrastructure deployment. Previously, he served as SVP of Business Development and Mining Strategies at Foundry Digital. At Foundry, Kevin oversaw the deployment of one of the largest North American fleets and helped build the world’s largest Bitcoin mining pool for four consecutive years.Prior to joining Foundry Digital, Kevin served as Chief Mining Officer at Greenidge Generation, where he transformed a 106MW natural gas plant into the first federally regulated power plant to mine Bitcoin, paving the way for broader institutional adoption of mining in the U.S. Before that, he served as Mining Operations Manager at Bitcoin.com. In 2016, he co-founded Project Spokane, a Bitcoin mining datacenter that he helped establish as the largest mining facility in North America at the time.

Biography_ZH: Kgothatso Ngako 是推动非洲大陆比特币采用的“加速器”，创立了 8333.mobi，为没有联网设备的人提供通过 USSD 收发比特币的钱包服务，并创立 exonumia.africa 项目，把比特币相关书籍翻译成多种非洲语言。
Biography_EN: Kgothatso Ngako is a catalyst, accelerating the adoption of Bitcoin across the African continent.He has founded 8333.mobi, a wallet focused on giving people without an internet connected device the ability to send and receive Bitcoin (primarily through USSD), and exonumia.africa (focused on translating Bitcoin literature into African languages).

Biography_ZH: Khalil 现任尼日利亚 Katsina 州政府经济顾问，曾担任 Kaduna 州投资促进署执行主任。他是一名长期比特币倡导者，致力于在新兴市场探索将治理与比特币结合的创新经济政策和州级战略。
Biography_EN: Khalil serves as the Economic Advisor to the Katsina State Government in Nigeria, and previously as the Executive Director of the Kaduna State Investment Promotion Agency in Nigeria. He is a passionate longtime Bitcoin advocate championing innovative economic policies and state-level strategies at the intersection of governance and Bitcoin in emerging markets

Biography_ZH: Khing Oei 是荷兰比特币国库公司 Treasury 的创始人兼 CEO。该公司希望成长为欧洲最大的比特币国库公司，获得 Winklevoss Capital 和 Nakamoto 等机构投资，并计划通过反向并购的方式在泛欧交易所阿姆斯特丹上市。
Biography_EN: Khing Oei is the Founder and CEO of Treasury, a Netherlands-based Bitcoin treasury company recently launched with the ambition to become Europe’s largest. Backed by investors including Winklevoss Capital and Nakamoto, Treasury has the intention to list via a reverse listing on Euronext Amsterdam.

Biography_ZH: Kingsley Advani 同时担任 Allocations CEO、Allo CEO 以及 Chainfund Capital 管理合伙人，自 2013 年以来，在多个基金中管理了逾 10 亿美元的加密资产，横跨一级和二级市场，并参与结构化超过 20 亿美元的私募股权交易。此前他是巴黎银行伦敦投行部并购顾问，参与规模超 100 亿美元的债务融资交易。作为最早期的种子投资人之一，他押注了以太坊、Solana、Polkadot、Avalanche、Arweave、Oasis、Coinbase 和 Robinhood 等多家加密独角兽，并投资了多家数字资产国库公司，包括 BNC Network Company（纳斯达克：BNC）、Nakamoto（纳斯达克：NAKA）、SUI Group（纳斯达克：SUIG）、TON Strategy（纳斯达克：TONX）、Satsuma（伦交所：SATS）、ETHZilla（纳斯达克：ETHZ）及 Forward Industries（纳斯达克：FORD）。
Biography_EN: Kingsley Advani is CEO of Allocations, CEO of Allo, Managing Partner of Chainfund Capital and has managed $1BN+ in crypto assets spanning private and public markets across multiple funds since 2013 and structured $2BN+ of private equity transactions. Previously, Kingsley was a Mergers & Acquisitions (M&A) investment banker at BNP Paribas in London where he advised on $10bn+ of debt financing transactions. Kingsley was an early / seed investor in a number of crypto unicorns including Ethereum, Solana, Polkadot, Avalanche, Arweave, Oasis, Coinbase and Robinhood. He has invested in multiple digital asset treasury companies including: BNC Network Company (NASDAQ: BNC), Nakamoto (NASDAQ: NAKA), SUI Group Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: SUIG), TON Strategy Company (NASDAQ: TONX), Satsuma Technology PLC (LSE: SATS), ETHZilla Corporation (NASDAQ: ETHZ) and Forward Industries, Inc. (NASDAQ: FORD).

Title_ZH: Head of PR, Director of the Master in Bitcoin
Title_EN: Head of PR, Director of the Master in Bitcoin
Biography_ZH: Kristýna Mazánková 是全球首个“比特币硕士”项目（Master in Bitcoin）主任，这是以英语授课、专注比特币社会、技术与经济现象的全球学术项目。2019 年进入比特币行业前，她在科技与企业传播领域积累多年经验，帮助跨国公司沟通创新与管理变革，后来担任 Trezor 创造者 SatoshiLabs 的传播负责人，如今则出任 BTC Inc 公关负责人，服务《Bitcoin Magazine》与全球比特币大会。在 Hesperides University，她致力于打造一种新型高等教育：把比特币视作人类组织、价值与信任方式的重大转折点，而非短暂潮流。正如她所说，“比特币值得拥有一个严肃、独立、全球化的学术空间”。她的工作将传播、教育、科技与追求智识和财务独立的运动紧密相连。
Biography_EN: Kristýna Mazánková is the Director of the Master in Bitcoin — the world’s first English and global academic program dedicated entirely and only to Bitcoin as a social, technological, and economic phenomenon.Before entering the Bitcoin industry in 2019, Kristýna built her career in technology and corporate communications, helping global and regional organizations communicate innovation and navigate change. She later led communications at SatoshiLabs, the creators of Trezor, and today serves as Head of PR at BTC Inc., the company behind Bitcoin Magazine and the world’s largest Bitcoin conferences.At Hesperides University, Kristýna is shaping a new kind of higher education — one that treats Bitcoin not as a trend, but as a turning point in human organization, value, and trust. As she puts it, “Bitcoin deserves an academic space — serious, independent, and global.”Her work connects communication, education, technology, and the growing movement for intellectual and financial independence.

Biography_ZH: Laura K. Inamedinova 是屡获殊荣的连续创业者、投资人和主旨演讲者，自 2016 年起分享自己在 Web3 与比特币领域的洞见。作为 Gate.com 的 CGEO，她负责搭建跨境合作伙伴关系并推动交易所全球增长，重点提升比特币的全球采用与使用。在加入 Gate.com 前，她创立 Web3 营销公司 LKI Consulting，将其规模做到 8 位数营收，并因此被《Entrepreneur》杂志评为“10 大女性企业家”之一，被 Silicon Valley Times 评为“国际商务 10 大女性”之一。2024 年，她将 LKI 交由新管理团队运营，自己仍为大股东。2025 年，她被《福布斯》墨西哥版评为“30 岁以下区块链远见者”之一。她个人也是一名活跃天使投资人，投资组合超过 40 个项目，曾任《福布斯》和《赫芬顿邮报》专栏作者，并频繁在国际舞台分享比特币如何重塑金融未来。
Biography_EN: Laura K. Inamedinova is an award-winning serial entrepreneur, investor, and keynote speaker sharing her insights on the Web3 and Bitcoin space since 2016.As CGEO at Gate.com, she builds cross-border partnerships and manages the global growth of the exchange, with a strong focus on advancing Bitcoin adoption and access worldwide.Before joining Gate.com, she founded a Web3 marketing agency, LKI Consulting, which she grew to 8-figures. This led her to be globally acclaimed as one of the “10 Women Entrepreneurs” by Entrepreneur Magazine and among the “Top 10 Women in International Business” by Silicon Valley Times.In 2024, she transferred the leadership of LKI Consulting to a new management team, while Laura remained the majority shareholder.Laura was recognized as one of the “Forbes 30 Under 30 Blockchain Visionaries” by Forbes Mexico in 2025, highlighting her impact on the Web3 and Bitcoin industry.On a personal level, Laura is a successful angel investor with 40+ projects in her portfolio, an ex-Forbes and Huffington Post columnist, and an internationally renowned speaker who frequently covers Bitcoin’s role in shaping the future of finance.

Biography_ZH: Leeor Groen 是 Spartan Group 合伙人，常驻瑞士，自 2016 年起活跃于加密行业，拥有逾十年在欧洲、北美和亚洲为科技公司提供交易撮合、投资与咨询的经验。在 Spartan，他与创始人、投资人和协议方紧密合作，帮助其在数字资产生态中推进战略增长、资本筹集与退出路径。
Biography_EN: Leeor Groen is a Partner at Spartan Group based in Switzerland and active in the industry since 2016. He brings over ten years of experience in dealmaking, investing in, and advising technology companies across Europe, North America and Asia. At Spartan, Leeor works closely with founders, investors, and protocols across the digital asset ecosystem, helping them navigate strategic growth, capital raising, and exits.

Biography_ZH: Lina Seiche 是漫画家、作家，也是全球知名比特币漫画与周边品牌 The Little HODLer 的创作者。自 2020 年起，The Little HODLer 连载漫画在网络和纸质出版物中收获数百万读者，其毛绒玩偶、漫画书和周边产品已销往 60 多个国家。自 2025 年起，The Little HODLer 在萨尔瓦多率先推出全球首个小学生金融教育项目，将比特币与基础理财知识以儿童友好的方式结合。
Biography_EN: Lina Seiche is a cartoonist, writer, and creator of The Little HODLer, one of the world’s most popular Bitcoin comic and merchandise brands. Since 2020, The Little HODLer comic series has reached millions of readers online and in print; The Little HODLer plushies, comic books, and other merchandise have been adopted by customers in over 60 countries. Since 2025, The Little HODLer pioneers the world’s first primary school financial education program in El Salvador.

Biography_ZH: Linah 是 Bitcoin Beef Bits 的联合创始人之一，这是一款“只用比特币结算”的高端牛肉零食品牌，利用比特币矿机的余热来烘干牛肉。她拥有市场营销背景，曾在 Uber 等多家初创与科技公司工作，一直热衷于创业与打造有价值的创新品牌。通过 Bitcoin Beef Bits，她探索如何将比特币工作量证明（PoW）用于可持续创新与有温度的品牌叙事。她活跃于 Nostr、X 和 Instagram，关心真实的营销、草根运动，以及如何把比特币创意融入既有企业。
Biography_EN: Linah is one of the co-founders of Bitcoin Beef Bits, a fiat-free premium beef snack dried using excess heat from Bitcoin miners. With a background in marketing and experience across startups and tech including Uber, she’s always been drawn to entrepreneurship and building innovative, value-driven brands.Through Bitcoin Beef Bits, she explores how Bitcoin’s Proof-of-Work can be harnessed for sustainable innovation and meaningful brand storytelling. Active on Nostr, X, and Instagram, Linah is passionate about authentic marketing, grassroots movements, and finding creative ways to integrate Bitcoin into existing companies.

Company_ZH: Bitsavers Eduhub and Trezor Academy kenya
Company_EN: Bitsavers Eduhub and Trezor Academy kenya
Biography_ZH: Linda Kariuki 是一位充满热情的比特币教育者，也是肯尼亚 Trezor Academy 的本地组织者，负责为大学生和社区开展线下比特币教育课程。她创立 Bitsavers Eduhub，专注金融素养与比特币教育，致力于推广比特币作为价值储藏和经济赋能工具。Linda 特别重视青年参与与性别平等，主导了多项社区项目，为学生、女性和弱势群体拆解比特币的复杂概念。她曾在内罗毕贫民区 Afribit Kibera 志愿授课，并担任 Bitcoin Unconference Kenya 的联合组织者，这是一场由本地建设者与教育者发起的草根会议。通过 Campus Caravan 等项目，她将全球比特币创新与非洲本地现实相连接，推动包容性参与、同侪学习与长期采用。
Biography_EN: Linda Kariuki is a passionate Bitcoin educator and the local organizer of Trezor Academy Kenya, where she leads in-person Bitcoin education sessions to campus students and communities. She is also the founder of Bitsavers Eduhub, a platform focused on financial literacy and Bitcoin education, with a mission to promote Bitcoin as a store of value and tool for economic empowerment.With a strong emphasis on youth engagement and gender inclusion, Linda has spearheaded community-driven programs that demystify Bitcoin for students, women, and underserved populations. She has volunteered to teach Bitcoin at Afribit Kibera, an informal settlement in Nairobi, and served as a co-organizer of the Bitcoin Unconference Kenya, a grassroots gathering of Bitcoin builders and educators.Through her leadership, Linda is bridging global Bitcoin innovation with local African realities, creating initiatives like the Campus Caravan to foster inclusive participation, peer learning, and long-term Bitcoin adoption.

Biography_ZH: Loren 是 UTXO Management 的资本筹集负责人，负责向现有及潜在投资人清晰传达公司的价值主张并对接需求。加入 UTXO 之前，他在 Canterbury Consulting 工作逾 11 年，这是一家管理 450 亿美元顾问资产的投资咨询公司，他负责在公募和私募市场中寻找、评估与跟踪投资管理人，期间担任固定收益和实物资产经理研究委员会主席以及对冲基金委员会副主席，并作为公司数字资产工作组创始成员参与相关研究。Loren 同时是 CFA 特许持证人和 CAIA（另类投资分析师）持证人。
Biography_EN: Loren is Head of Capital Formation at UTXO Management, where he is responsible for articulating the firm’s value proposition and addressing the needs of both current and prospective investors. Before joining UTXO Management, Loren spent over eleven years at Canterbury Consulting, an investment consulting firm overseeing $45 billion in assets under advisement. There, he was responsible for sourcing, underwriting, and monitoring investment managers across public and private markets. During his tenure, he served as Chair of the Fixed Income and Real Assets Manager Research Committees and Vice Chair of the Hedge Funds Committee. He was also a founding member of Canterbury’s digital assets working group. Loren is a CFA® charterholder and a Chartered Alternative Investment Analyst.

Biography_ZH: MillionMiner 是欧洲领先的专业矿机硬件供应商，与 NiceHash、VoskCoin、EMCD 等多家行业巨头建立了紧密合作关系，不仅提供一流的 ASIC 矿机，还为客户提供全球范围内的活动、矿池以及托管服务资源。无论是新手还是专业矿工，MillionMiner 都通过先进技术、可靠支持、公平价格和国际网络，帮助客户实现可持续的挖矿收益。
Biography_EN: MillionMiner is the leading provider of professional mining hardware in Europe. With strong partnerships with industry leaders such as NiceHash, VoskCoin, EMCD and many more, MillionMiner not only offers first-class ASIC miners, but also exclusive access to events, mining pools and hosting services worldwide. Whether you are new to mining or a professional, we combine state-of-the-art technology with reliable support, fair prices and an international network for sustainable mining success.

Biography_ZH: Luca 是 Munich International Mining LLC 的联合创始人兼首席商务拓展官（CBDO），其职业生涯证明了勤奋、专注和追随热情（比特币挖矿）的力量。他不断寻找新机会扩展矿业版图，走访全球，与志同道合的个人与机构建立合作关系。作为许多客户信赖的合作伙伴，Luca 以可靠、诚实和正直著称，致力于去中心化和行业民主化，为全球更多人参与挖矿创造机会。
Biography_EN: Co-Founder & CBDO at Munich International Mining LLCBio: Luca is a testament to the power of hard work, dedication, and a relentless pursuit of one's passions - Bitcoin Mining. He is always on the lookout for new opportunities and ways to expand his mining operation. Luca's travels have taken him around the world, where he has forged valuable partnerships with other like-minded individuals and organizations.As a trusted partner to many people, Luca has built a reputation for his reliability, honesty, and integrity. His commitment to decentralization and democratizing the space has opened up new opportunities for people around the world to participate in the mining process.

Biography_ZH: Luthando Ndabambi 目前担任 Bitcoin Ekasi 的社区总监（或项目社区负责人），该项目致力于在南非通过比特币推动金融包容。他于 2019 年 5 月加入青少年冲浪与教育项目 The Surfer Kids，担任冲浪教练，并在 2021 年 8 月左右开始深入学习比特币，帮助本地乡镇商店接入比特币支付。
Biography_EN: Luthando Ndabambi currently serves as Community Director (or Project Community Lead) for Bitcoin Ekasi — an initiative focused on Bitcoin adoption and financial inclusion in South Africa.Earlier, he joined The Surfer Kids (a surf coaching / youth engagement programme) in May 2019 as a surf coach.Over time, he expanded his work into the Bitcoin space (around August 2021) by learning about Bitcoin and helping onboard township shops to accept Bitcoin as payment.

Biography_ZH: Manash Goswami 拥有 CPA、CFA 与 MBA 资质，是 Synteq Digital 的首席财务官。凭借在科技、电力、物流、电商与资本市场领域 25 年以上的经验，他负责公司所有财务运营与战略，包括预算、预测和报告，为业务增长提供坚实支撑。
Biography_EN: Manash Goswami, CPA, CFA, MBA, is Chief Financial Officer at Synteq Digital. With over 25 years of experience across technology, power, logistics, e‑commerce, and capital markets, he leads all financial operations and strategy, including budgeting, forecasting, and reporting, to support business growth.

Biography_ZH: Maria Vovchok 是一位资深媒体人与知名大会主持人，拥有逾十年媒体从业经验，以及超过八年区块链、金融科技和 Web3 传播经验。她以专业流畅的主持风格与深刻的洞察著称，擅长在全球多元市场间，把复杂技术话题转化为大众易懂的内容。Maria 的 Web3 之旅始于多家区块链媒体的新闻编辑与主播，随后转向区块链企业的市场与公关岗位，多年来与风投基金、天使投资人和创业者建立了紧密联系。她多次担任全球科技与商业大会的主持与圆桌嘉宾，包括 TOKEN2049、香港金融科技周、利雅得 LEAP 等，并曾出任 World of Web3 Summit 的董事总经理及 Moniify 电视节目的特邀主持人。目前，Maria 在迪拜区块链中心担任商务拓展负责人兼媒体主管，同时主持 Encrypted 播客，与 Web3 生态顶尖声音深度对话，并近期加入 Gate 出任数字制片人与主持人。除职业工作外，她还是乌克兰区块链协会大使，并被 DX Talks 评选为中东和北非地区“金融科技与区块链 25 位顶尖女性”之一。
Biography_EN: Maria Vovchok is an accomplished media professional and distinguished conference MC with over a decade of experience in media and more than eight years in blockchain, fintech, and Web3 communications.Recognized for her articulate and insightful approach, Maria bridges complex technological subjects with broad and diverse audiences across global markets.She began her Web3 journey as a news editor and anchor at several blockchain media outlets, later transitioning into marketing and PR roles within blockchain companies. Over the years, she has built strong relationships with VC funds, angel investors, and startup founders.Maria has served as an MC and moderator at numerous tech and business conferences worldwide. Her distinguished presence has been sought by premier events such as TOKEN2049, Hong Kong FinTech Week, LEAP Riyadh, and more. She also served as Managing Director of the World of Web3Summit, and was a contributing TV host at Moniify.Currently, Maria is the Head of Business Development & Media Lead at the Dubai Blockchain Center, where she also hosts the Encrypted podcast, interviewing top voices in the Web3 ecosystem. She has also recently joined Gate as a Digital Producer & Host.Beyond her professional work, Maria holds an ambassadorial rolewith the Blockchain Association of Ukraine, and has been honored as one of the Top 25 Women in Fintech & Blockchain in MENA by DX Talks.

Biography_ZH: Mark 是 OCEAN 的总裁兼联合创始人，该矿池致力于通过赋能矿工重新掌握话语权，推动比特币挖矿的去中心化发展。转型为全职比特币企业家之前，他在加拿大与美国从事高压电力系统设计与运营近 20 年，曾任电气工程师及公用事业高管。Mark 是 7 个孩子的父亲，坚信比特币是这一代人最重要的“自由技术”。
Biography_EN: Mark is the President and co-founder at OCEAN, a leading Bitcoin mining pool focused on decentralization, by empowering miners to reclaim their prominent position in the Bitcoin ecosystem. Mark is a former electrical engineer and utility executive, having spent 2 decades in high voltage power system design and operations in Canada and the USA prior to becoming a full time Bitcoin entrepreneur. Mark is a father of 7 and advocate of Bitcoin as the freedom technology of our lifetime.

Biography_ZH: Mark Connors 是 Risk Dimensions 的创始人，这是一家外包首席风险官（OCRO）顾问机构，将他 35 年机构投资与融资经验与比特币和人工智能的最新进展相结合。他的职业生涯跨越交易台、多策略对冲基金以及瑞信等机构的面向客户数据战略岗位。加密寒冬 2022–2023 期间，他在 3iQ 负责研究，通过行为金融、债务周期框架与传统风险模型来解析当时危机，强调这不是协议失败，而是市场参与者的失误。这种跨学科视角也延续到他当前的研究与咨询工作，论证比特币已不再是投机异类，而应被纳入各类多资产组合的风险收益版图。
Biography_EN: Mark Connors is the founder of Risk Dimensions, an OCRO (Outsourced Chief Risk Officer) advisory that integrates his 35 years of institutional investment and financing experience with the recent advancements of bitcoin and AI. His career spans trading desks, multi-strategy hedge funds, and client-facing data strategy roles at Credit Suisse.More recently, Mark led research at 3iQ during the 2022–23 crypto winter, where he applied behavioral finance, debt-cycle frameworks, and traditional risk models to contextualize the crisis—not as a protocol failure, but a failure of market participants.This cross-disciplinary perspective drives his current research and consulting practice that demonstrates bitcoin is no longer a speculative anomaly and warrants inclusion in any multi-asset portfolio across the risk-reward spectrum.

Biography_ZH: Mark Moss 是投资人、企业家与教育者，专注帮助大众在比特币时代理解和应对快速变化的金融格局。作为比特币的早期采用者和倡导者，他通过将复杂的经济与技术趋势拆解为清晰、可操作的洞见，在全球建立了庞大受众。他主持的《The Mark Moss Show》重点讨论比特币国库管理，以及比特币如何重塑货币、市场与全球权力结构。凭借数十年成功投资与创业经验，Mark 现聚焦于帮助个人与机构理解比特币作为健全货币与金融主权工具的战略意义。
Biography_EN: Mark Moss is a leading educator, investor, and entrepreneur dedicated to helping people navigate the changing financial landscape through Bitcoin. As one of the early adopters and advocates of Bitcoin, Mark has built a global following by breaking down complex economic and technological trends into simple, actionable insights. He hosts The Mark Moss Show, where he discusses Bitcoin Treasuries, teaches how Bitcoin is reshaping money, markets, and the global power structure. With decades of experience as a successful investor and business owner, Mark now focuses on empowering individuals and institutions to understand Bitcoin's role as sound money and atool for financial sovereignty.

Biography_ZH: Marko 很早便开始接触比特币，见证了挖矿从 CPU、GPU 到 ASIC 的演进历程。目前他在 NiceHash 担任首席挖矿经理，自 2018 年加入以来专注管理与优化加密挖矿产品与运营。
Biography_EN: Marko's journey with Bitcoin began in its early days, allowing him to witness the evolution of mining from CPU-based to GPU and ASIC-based setups.Currently serving as the Lead Mining Manager at NiceHash, he has been with NiceHash since 2018​. At NiceHash, he focuses on managing and optimizing cryptocurrency mining products and operations.

Biography_ZH: 他已投资比特币超过五年，是 MSTR True North 的创始成员之一，这是专注比特币国库公司的头部播客；同时担任 Méliuz 的比特币战略总监，这家公司是巴西及拉美地区首家“公开比特币国库公司”。
Biography_EN: Bitcoin investor for half a decade; founding member of MSTR True North, the leading podcast on Bitcoin treasury companies; and Director of Bitcoin Strategy at Méliuz, the first public Bitcoin treasury company in Brazil and Latin America.

Biography_ZH: Matt Cole 自 2023 年 4 月起担任 Strive 的 CEO，并兼任董事会主席。他是一位长期比特币投资人与倡导者，在机构资产管理与固定收益领域拥有深厚经验，曾在加州公务员退休体系（CalPERS）从事全球固定收益管理 15 年，负责管理逾 700 亿美元的主动型债券资产。2022 年加入 Strive 资产管理，先后担任投资办公室负责人、全球固定收益主管兼 CIO，并于 2023 年升任 CEO。作为 CEO，他专注于提供创新的比特币解决方案，重塑美国投资者与比特币的互动方式，让比特币更加易用、实用，并成为个人与机构财富规划的核心组成部分，同时继续通过“股东友好型”股票 ETF 和主动管理的固定收益 ETF 赋能投资者。Matt 是 CFA 持证人，拥有加州州立大学萨克拉门托分校 MBA 学位。
Biography_EN: Matt Cole has served as Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Strive since April 2023 and serves as the Chairman of the Board.A long-time Bitcoin investor and advocate, Matt has extensive experience in institutional asset management and fixed income, having spent 15 years at CalPERS in global fixed income, where he oversaw over $70 billion in actively managed Fixed Income assets. Matt joined Strive Asset Management in May 2022 as Head of Investment Office & Global Fixed Income. He was promoted to Chief Investment Officer, Global Head of Fixed Income in February 2023 before also becoming CEO of Strive. As CEO, Matt is focused on delivering innovative Bitcoin solutions and transforming how Americans interact with Bitcoin, making it accessible, practical, and central to their financial futures, while Strive remains committed to empowering investors through its pro-shareholder focused equity ETFs and actively managed Fixed Income ETFs. Matt is a CFA charterholder and holds an MBA from California State University — Sacramento.

Biography_ZH: Maurizio 是一位资深比特币爱好者，也是长期运营播客 Mr M Podcast 的主持人，多年来持续探索比特币世界。凭借逾十年的行业经验，他以深入浅出的分析、与行业领袖的访谈及对区块链最新趋势与发展的讨论而受到听众欢迎。他对去中心化与金融主权的热情，持续推动着他围绕数字货币未来展开高质量对话。
Biography_EN: Maurizio is a seasoned Bitcoin enthusiast and host of the long-running podcast Mr M Podcast which has been exploring the world of Bitcoin. With over a decade of experience in the crypto space, Maurizio provides insightful analysis, interviews with industry leaders, and discussions on the latest trends and developments in the blockchain ecosystem.His passion for decentralisation and financial sovereignty continues to drive engaging conversations about the future of digital currencies.

Biography_ZH: 他是 Block 旗下 Bitkey 与 Proto 部门负责人，主导开发公司自托管比特币钱包 Bitkey 以及模块化矿机系统 Proto。担任现职之前，他曾任 Block 硬件安全负责人，组建并领导产品安全与安全工程团队，负责保护多款 Square 产品，并交付支撑 Square 技术栈不同层级的关键安全组件。
Biography_EN: is Bitkey & Proto Lead at Block, leading the development of the company’s self-custody bitcoin wallet Bitkey as well as the modular mining system, Proto. Prior to assuming this leadership role, Max was Hardware Security Lead at Block where he built and led product security and security engineering teams responsible for protecting a wide range of Square products and for shipping critical components that powered many different levels of Square's technology stack

Biography_ZH: Michael Ashby 是一位在对冲基金与家族办公室领域深耕 20 年的资深金融从业者，现任全球量化交易公司 AlgoQuant 的 CEO 与 CIO。AlgoQuant 既运作自有资本，也对外配置资金，并正搭建资管业务部门。
Biography_EN: Michael Ashby is an accomplished hedge fund and family office professional with 20 years of experience in the financial sector. He serves as CEO and CIO at AlgoQuant, a global quantitative trading firm. AlgoQuant manages internal capital, allocates to external managers and is building an asset management unit.

Biography_ZH: Michael Martin 是机构加密顾问与财富管理领域的权威，目前在全球知名私人银行瑞联银行（Bank Julius Baer）担任数字资产银行业务高级客户经理。其 20 年金融职业生涯跨越苏黎世、伦敦和迪拜等全球金融中心，一直致力于在传统金融与快速演进的数字资产世界之间搭建桥梁。在瑞联银行，他为企业家、家族办公室和机构投资者设计长期财富架构，将加密资产无缝整合进他们的战略资产配置中。在严格的瑞士监管框架下，Michael 通过安全托管、金融产品与投资组合策略，帮助客户合规接触比特币与数字资产，一次一个客户地塑造数字资产银行业务的未来。
Biography_EN: Michael Martin is a leading expert in institutional crypto advisory and private wealth management, currently serving as Senior Relationship Manager for Digital Asset Banking at Bank Julius Baer, one of world’s most respected private banks. With a career spanning 20 years across global financial centers— including Zurich, London, and Dubai — Michael has helped bridge the gap between traditional finance and the rapidly evolving world of digital assets.At Julius Baer, he advises a global client base of entrepreneurs, family offices, and institutional investors on the seamless integration of crypto assets into long-term wealth strategies.At the intersection of regulation, innovation, and client-centric advisory, Michael empowers clients to access Bitcoin and digital assets through secure custody, financial products, and strategic portfolio solutions.Within the robust Swiss banking framework, Michael is shaping the future of digital asset banking — one relationship at a time.

Biography_ZH: Michael Peterson 是“比特币海滩”（Bitcoin Beach）项目的发起人，这一项目推动萨尔瓦多政府将比特币确立为法定货币，使这一中美洲小国意外成为挑战布雷顿森林体系下既有货币秩序的引爆点。他和团队展示了开放货币体系如何帮助生活在极端贫困与高风险环境中的人群实现金融包容。近几年，主流媒体对“比特币海滩”进行了大量报道，包括《60 分钟》和 HBO 等节目，将有关比特币的主流叙事从“跑车与炫富”转向“为弱势群体争取金融自主与自我主权”。
Biography_EN: Michael Peterson is the creative mind behind the Bitcoin Beach project that spurred the government of El Salvador to embrace Bitcoin as legal tender. The adoption of Bitcoin has put El Salvador in the spotlight as the unlikely catalyst to upend the worlds current monetary order established in Brenton Woods. Michael and his team have demonstrated how an open monetary system can overcome the challenges of bringing financial inclusion to those of the bottom rung of the economic ladder living in the most challenging of environments. In the past few years there have been hundreds of articles from major publications and dozens of film crews covering Bitcoin Beach and the revolution that it has sparked. The coverage of Bitcoin Beach from media giants like 60 Minutes and HBO have helped move the mainstream narrative about Bitcoin from “Bros and Lambos” to “financial inclusion and self sovereignty” for those previously trapped in destructive cycles of poverty.

Biography_ZH: Mohammed Alshiekh 是 DEMA Energy 的 CTO 兼联合创始人，专注构建利用比特币挖矿作为可调节负载的电力系统，用于电网平衡。凭借 15 年以上工程与人工智能经验，他开发了浸没式冷却矿机基础设施、矿机集群管理系统以及将比特币挖矿与虚拟电厂（VPP）结合的平台，将比特币与能源创新深度融合。
Biography_EN: Mohammed Alshiekh, CTO and co-founder of DEMA Energy, builds systems that use Bitcoin mining as a flexible grid-balancing load. With 15+ years in engineering and AI, he develops immersion-cooled mining infrastructure, fleet management systems, and VPP platforms that merge Bitcoin and energy innovation.

Biography_ZH: 作为 amana 的 CEO，Muhammad Rasoul 一直坚定支持透明度建设、金融素养普及，并确保每个人都有机会与学习工具去触达多资产投资世界。通过为多资产交易与投资打造更透明的基础设施，他正推动 amana 站在区域金融行业创新与普惠化的前沿。在长达 25 年的职业生涯中，Rasoul 在全球金融业被视为创新者与思想领袖，他作为增长战略专家，在 Gain Capital、GFT Markets 与 B2B 流动性提供商 Alpha 等公司的创立、扩张与成功出售中发挥了关键作用，并曾为 CFTC、NFA、ASIC、FCA 和日本 FSA 等监管机构提供咨询。他目前与妻子 Sabina 及女儿 Amirah 与 Alivia 定居迪拜，闲暇时常与在美国学习与工作的三个年长子女 Nadia、Yaseen 和 Aiden 保持密切联系，也是哲学与历史爱好者，尤其痴迷早期美国史，同时是切尔西俱乐部的资深球迷。
Biography_EN: As the CEO of amana, Muhammad Rasoul is a strong supporter of transparency, building financial literacy, and ensuring everyone has both the opportunity and the learning tools to scale the heights of the investment world. And by laying the groundwork for a more transparent approach to multi-asset trading and investing, he is steering amana into the forefront of a more innovative and accessible regional financial industry.Over the course of his 25-year career, Rasoul has established a global presence as a financial industry innovator and thought leader. His expertise as a growth strategist has been instrumental in the creation, expansion, and successful sale of multiple companies, including Gain Capital, GFT Markets, and B2B liquidity provider, Alpha. He has also advised the CFTC, NFA, ASIC, FCA, and FSA in Japan.Muhammad lives in Dubai with his wife, Sabina, and daughters Amirah and Alivia. In his spare time, he keeps in touch with Nadia, Yaseen, and Aiden, his three elder children, all of whom study and work in their native US. He is also an avid philosophy and history buff and can be found pouring over books about early American history. Last but not least, Muhammad is a fan of football and a long-time supporter of Chelsea Football Club!

Biography_ZH: Muslim Bitcoiner 是非营利组织 Bitcoin Majlis 的联合创始人，这一组织致力于向穆斯林群体传播比特币知识，并揭示法币制度的隐性危害。他著有新书《Anti-Riba Money: Dismantling Usury through Bitcoin》，从伊斯兰教义出发系统论证拒绝法币、拥抱比特币的理由。他活跃于 X 和 Nostr，不断推动穆斯林个人与机构加深对比特币的理解与应用。
Biography_EN: Muslim Bitcoiner is the co-founder of Bitcoin Majlis, a non-profit organization dedicated to educating Muslims about Bitcoin and exposing the dangers of fiat currency. He is the author of Anti-Riba Money: Dismantling Usury through Bitcoin, a recently published book that presents a compelling Islamic case for rejecting fiat and embracing Bitcoin. Active on both X and Nostr, he works to promote a deeper understanding of Bitcoin and its adoption within Muslim communities and organizations.

Biography_ZH: Naser El Agha 在比特币与加密挖矿行业拥有 5 年以上领导经验，现任 CEO，主导多区域挖矿业务的建设、扩张与优化，重点关注基础设施开发、能效提升与可持续增长。他擅长挖矿基础设施设计、大型项目执行、能源优化与监管策略。在他的带领下，公司建设了多处先进矿场，引入了高效风冷与水冷系统，并拿下多项政府合约与战略合作。除运营之外，他还通过拓展加盟与区域分支机构扩大公司版图，持续倡导负责任挖矿，与监管机构合作制定支持创新与节能的区块链相关政策。凭借对能源基础设施与数字金融的深刻理解，Naser 致力于将比特币挖矿打造成可持续且具战略意义的支柱产业。
Biography_EN: Naser El Agha is a seasoned leader with over five years of experience in the Bitcoin and cryptocurrency mining industry. As CEO, he has played a pivotal role in building, scaling, and optimizing mining operations across multiple regions, with a strong focus on infrastructure development, energy efficiency, and sustainable growth.His expertise spans mining infrastructure design, large-scale project execution, energy optimization, and regulatory strategy. Under his leadership, the company has successfully developed state-of-the-art mining farms, introduced advanced air and hydro cooling systems, and secured strategic government contracts and partnerships.Beyond operations, Naser has been instrumental in expanding the company’s footprint by establishing new franchises and regional branches. He continues to advocate for responsible mining practices and works closely with regulatory bodies to shape policies that support innovation and energy-efficient blockchain adoption.Driven by a vision to position Bitcoin mining as a sustainable and strategic industry, Naser combines technical knowledge with business foresight. A perfect balance between energy infrastructure and digital finance.

Biography_ZH: Neil Jacobs 是比特币行业领先的市场策略师、教育者与内容创作者，拥有“四大”会计师事务所 CPA 背景与 15 万社交媒体粉丝。他曾为多家头部比特币公司驱动品牌与营收增长，包括共同创立 FOMO21.com（客户遍布 70 多个国家），并曾任 Swan Bitcoin 品牌参与负责人。Neil 在十多年前便开始研究比特币，并很快成为积极的公开倡导者，曾主持《Inside Bitcoin》等播客，并在非营利组织 SatsCenter 董事会任职，推动比特币教育。他结合财务专业与战略视角，系统推广比特币理念并促进行业全球采用。
Biography_EN: Neil Jacobs is a leading marketing strategist, educator, and content creator in the Bitcoin industry. With a big-four CPA background and 150,000 social media followers, he has driven brand and revenue growth for prominent Bitcoin companies, including co-founding FOMO21.com—which has served customers in over 70 countries—and previously serving as Head of Brand Engagement at Swan Bitcoin.Neil’s Bitcoin journey began over a decade ago and he became a vocal advocate in the years that followed. Since then, he has hosted podcasts like Inside Bitcoin and served on the Board of Directors for SatsCenter, a nonprofit advancing Bitcoin education. Neil combines financial expertise with strategic vision to champion Bitcoin and foster its adoption globally.

Biography_ZH: 他是 BitFuFu 的商务总监，负责公司在能源合作与基础设施开发方面的工作，同时推动公司技术与运营的垂直整合。BitFuFu（纳斯达克代码：FUFU）是一家领先的比特币挖矿与挖矿服务平台，通过自挖、托管与云算力等业务，并结合一体化技术栈，提供高效、具韧性、可响应电网调度的大规模算力服务。
Biography_EN: Commercial Director at BitFuFu, overseeing the company’s energy partnerships and infrastructure development, while driving vertical integration across the company’s technology and operations. BitFuFu (Nasdaq: FUFU) is a leading platform in Bitcoin mining and mining services—combining self-mining, hosting, and cloud hashrate with an integrated stack to deliver efficient, resilient, and grid-responsive compute at scale.

Biography_ZH: Omar Al Yousif 是一位工程师、投资人与资本市场专家，具备项目管理背景，在中东牵头推进多项数字与智慧基础设施项目，并在东京、香港、伦敦与纳斯达克等地主导高规格数字资产国库与资本市场项目。作为 7-E Emirates Holding 副主席与 10X Capital 合伙人，他专注于打通亚洲与海湾地区资本市场，设计跨境上市架构并为企业提供公开市场战略咨询。职业生涯中，他在西门子与阿联酋铁路等机构担任高级领导职位，负责数十亿美元规模的基础设施、科技与交通项目。凭借在政府与大型企业间的广泛人脉，他擅长整合关键利益相关方，通过创新投资模式推动从轨道交通到区块链在内的一系列变革项目。他拥有牛津大学大型项目管理硕士学位，以及伦敦大学建筑与项目管理荣誉学士学位。
Biography_EN: Omar Al Yousif is an engineer, investor, and capital markets specialist with a background in project management. He has been pioneering and managing major digital and smart infrastructure projects across the Middle East, in addition to leading high-profile digital asset treasury initiatives in Tokyo, Hong Kong, London, and Nasdaq.As Deputy Chairman of 7-E Emirates Holding and Partner at 10X Capital, Omar works on bridging capital markets between Asia and the Gulf, structuring cross-border listings, and advising on public market strategies. His career includes senior leadership roles at Siemens AG and Etihad Rail, where he spearheaded multi-billion-dollar infrastructure, technology, and mobility projects across the MENA region.With deep government and corporate networks, Omar is recognized for his ability to unite strategic stakeholders, drive innovative investment models, and advance transformative projects across industries from rail to blockchain.Education: MSc in Major Program Management, University of Oxford; BSc (Hons) in Construction & Project Management, University of London

Biography_ZH: Paul Boots 现任迪拜虚拟资产监管局（VARA）行业发展负责人，是一位经验丰富的高级管理者与企业家，在创新、领导力与市场开发方面有着扎实战绩。他的职业背景横跨金融服务、战略与科技，在中东 P2P 金融模式的构建中发挥重要作用，曾作为 Beehive 集团首任 COO，打造区域首批 P2P 借贷平台之一。他还共同创立了一家精品咨询公司，为阿联酋大型企业提供领导力发展与战略咨询，尤其关注 AI 驱动技术。更早之前，他是迪拜多种商品中心（DMCC）管理团队成员之一，协助将迪拜打造为多行业全球贸易枢纽，并主导设计了支持伊斯兰银行合作的商品贸易融资平台。近期，他还受迪拜投资公司委托，主导建设大型 B2B 市场。Paul 毕业于巴布森学院，对领导力、创业精神和高绩效团队建设有浓厚热情。其在 VARA 的任命契合迪拜 D33 战略，将在把迪拜打造为虚拟资产全球中心、以及推动该领域监管与创新方面发挥关键作用。
Biography_EN: BIOGRAPHYPaul Boots - Head of Sector Development, Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority (VARA)Paul Boots, Head of Sector Development at the Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority (VARA), brings with him a wealth of experience as a senior executive and entrepreneur with a proven track record in innovation, leadership, and market development. With a diverse background spanning financial services, strategy, and technology, Paul has been instrumental in shaping the Middle East’s peer-to-peer financing landscape, notably as the founding Group COO at Beehive, where he pioneered one of the region's first peer-to-peer lending platforms. His entrepreneurial expertise also extends to co-founding a boutique advisory firm that focuses on leadership development and strategy for large UAE-based companies, with a special focus on AI-driven technologies.Before these ventures, Paul played a key role in the executive leadership team at the Dubai Multi Commodities Centre (DMCC), where he was instrumental in establishing Dubai as a global hub for trade across multiple industries. During his tenure, he conceptualized and built DMCC’s commodity trade finance platform, which facilitated Islamic banking partnerships. More recently, Paul led the development of a large B2B marketplace on behalf of the Investment Corporation of Dubai, further showcasing his ability to build innovative platforms that drive economic growth.A graduate of Babson College, Paul’s passion for leadership, entrepreneurship, and building high-performing teams is central to his approach. His appointment at VARA aligns with Dubai’s strategic goals under the D33 agenda, as Paul’s leadership in sector development will play a critical role in positioning the Emirate as a global leader in the virtual assets space. His unique blend of strategic insight and operational expertise are pivotal as VARA continues to shape the future of virtual asset regulation and innovation.

Biography_ZH: Paul Dawalibi 是科技企业家、投资人、“独角兽”创始人、未来学家与玩家，拥有超过 25 年风投与创业经验。现任 Innovation City CEO，正在阿联酋哈伊马角打造全球首个完全由 AI 驱动的自由区，将其建设为中东的“硅谷”。此前，他担任 Holodeck CEO，领导一家专注游戏、电竞与 Web3 的全球媒体与科技公司。凭借对创新商业机会的敏锐把握，他已成为中东和北非地区最具影响力的科技与游戏领域意见领袖之一。Paul 是 CNBC Arabia 节目《Game Changers》的主持人与创作者，节目覆盖中东 5000 万家庭，同时也是《Business of Esports》播客的创始人和主持人，被视为电竞与游戏行业商业侧最具权威的媒体阵地之一。他曾担任迪拜电竞节（现 GameExpo）首任主席，多次受邀在全球顶级科技与创新大会发表演讲，为家族办公室、政府与大公司提供关于初创、Web3、AI、游戏与创新生态建设的咨询，也是世界首个电竞 NFT 的创作者和 2020 年加拿大增长最快企业的创始人。他著有《Metaverse Dream》，为 Assouline 出版的里程碑式元宇宙著作，并为畅销电竞商业书籍《The Book of Esports》撰写前言。
Biography_EN: Paul Dawalibi is a technology entrepreneur, investor, unicorn founder, futurist and gamer, with over 25 years of venture capital and startup experience. He is currently the CEO of Innovation City, the world’s first free zone fully powered by artificial intelligence (AI) in the UAE, where he is building the Silicon Valley of the Middle East in Ras Al Khaimah. Previously, he was CEO of Holodeck - the leading global media and technology company focused on gaming, esports and web3. His ability to communicate the business opportunity around innovation has made him the largest industry influencer and expert in the MENA region. Paul is the host and creator of Game Changers - a groundbreaking business show on CNBC Arabia reaching 50M homes in the Middle East. He is a frequently requested speaker at tech, startup, web3, and gaming conferences all around the world. He consults family offices, governments, investors, and global companies on startups and building innovation ecosystems. Paul is also the creator of the world's 1st esports NFT and founder of the 2020 fastest growing company in Canada. He believes that the future is fun™.On TV and in media:• My content is consumed daily and trusted by millions in 66 countries around the world, and am widely recognized as the thought leader in the region for startups, tech and gaming.• Host & Creator of “Game Changers” – the most exciting weekly show on CNBC Arabia focused on gaming, esports and the metaverse, reaching 50M homes in the MENA region.• Host & Creator of the world-famous Business of Esports podcast - the largest esports and gaming industry outlet and the only authority on the business side of the gaming/esports industry.Live and in person:• Chairman of the 1st ever Dubai Esports Festival (now called GameExpo)• Invited to speak at the biggest innovation and technology conferences in the world - Next World Forum (KSA), PAX East, Esports Business Summit, World Metaverse Forum, GITEX, SALT, Crypto Bahamas, DIFCFintech Week, World Corporate Summit, Step, LEAP, TMRW, World AI Show, Future Blockchain Summit, RetailME Icons, Fast Company: World Changing Ideas, Dubai Future Forum, Ignite, World Blockchain Summit, Web Summit, AIM Congress, MIT NextTech Summit, etc…• Retained as a startup, web3, AI, gaming, and esports expert bycompanies, family offices, governments, and investors around the world.• Professor of esports business at Saint Peter's University In books• Author of Metaverse Dream – landmark metaverse book published by Assouline.• Wrote the foreword for the best-selling esports business book of all time (The Book of Esports)• As a VC, I've been talking about gaming, esports and the metaverse since 2011. At work (recent)• Building the Silicon Valley of the Middle East and a global hub for innovation in Ras Al Khaimah• Architect of a world-class gaming investment program for Abu Dhabi (DCT / ADGaming)• Member of the Dubai Program for Gaming Working Group, charting the direction and future of the gaming industry in Dubai• Advisor to Dubai Police on gaming and esports strategies• Consulted as a subject matter expert on the concept & business model for Qiddiya (KSA gaming district)• Consulted with Dubai Health Authority on the metaverse and gamification ofhealthcare and was recognized by the Director General of DHA• Developed the gaming content strategy for GITEX / Future Blockchain Summit• Expert on building early stage tech, gaming and venture ecosystems

Biography_ZH: Pavlenex 是一名产品经理，致力于通过开源支付解决方案和挖矿基础设施加速比特币采用。目前，他负责 BTCPay Server（开源比特币支付处理器）以及下一代挖矿协议 Stratum V2 的产品战略，后者旨在提升挖矿的去中心化和效率。他同时是 Block（原 Square）旗下非营利项目 Spiral 的受赠开发者，该项目由 Jack Dorsey 创立，专注资助自由与开源的比特币项目。作为 HUB21（最早的实体比特币空间之一）和 BitcoinSmiles（向萨尔瓦多贫困社区提供牙科医疗的非营利项目）的联合创始人，他在推动技术进步的同时，也积极投身比特币相关的社会公益。
Biography_EN: Pavlenex is a product manager dedicated to accelerating Bitcoin adoption through open-source payment solutions and mining infrastructure. He currently leads product strategy at BTCPay Server, an open-source payment processor, and Stratum V2, a next-gen mining protocol focused on enhancing decentralization and efficiency in mining. He is also a grantee of Spiral, a non-profit initiative by Block (formerly Square), founded by Jack Dorsey, dedicated to supporting free and open-source Bitcoin projects. He co-founded HUB21, one of the first physical Bitcoin hubs and BitcoinSmiles, a non-profit initiative providing dental healthcare to impoverished communities in rural El Salvador, Pavlenex actively contributes to both technological advancement and social impact within the Bitcoin ecosystem.

Biography_ZH: Pedro 是 Bitcoin Conference 的设计师与开发者，同时深度参与多项无 KYC 开源项目，如 Bisq 和 Mempool。他正在执导纪录片《Anatomy of Bitcoin》，并负责 SatSigner 项目的设计工作，还创立了研究与出版机构 PirateHash，及联合创办闪电网络游戏《Chain Duel》，以多种形式推动比特币文化与基础设施发展。
Biography_EN: Pedro is a designer and developer for the Bitcoin Conference. In addition to extensive contributions to no-KYC open source projects like Bisq and Mempool, he's directing the film Anatomy of Bitcoin, leads the design for the SatSigner project, founded the research and publishing house PirateHash, and co-founded the lighting game Chain Duel.

Biography_ZH: Peter 是 Hub71 团队的重要成员，负责战略与产品开发。他主要负责为 Hub71 生态设计新产品与项目，并寻找合适合作伙伴共同落地。其核心工作之一是为初创企业、大公司、政府机构、大学和全球创新中心之间寻找协同效应，通过“配对”与项目嫁接，推动一个完整运转的科技生态系统成型。他参与设计和推出了企业合作计划、风投孵化器、价值创造计划、高校合作、面向初创的银行产品以及“Outliers”等多个重要项目。加入 Hub71 之前，他在罗兰贝格战略咨询担任项目经理，从事科技生态建设、国家级发展战略、新业务孵化、公私合营合作以及数字化转型与重组工作，为如今塑造 Hub71 战略打下坚实基础。Peter 毕业于贝鲁特美国大学土木与环境工程专业，并获得斯坦福大学机器学习证书。
Biography_EN: Peter is a key member of the Hub71 team, leading on Strategy and Product Development.In his current role, Peter plays an integral role in designing new products and programs for the Hub71 ecosystem as well as identifying the right partners that could activate such programs.A key part of Peter’s role is identifying synergies between startups, corporates, government entities, universities, global hubs and programs. Matchmaking entities based on identified synergies is a key role in enabling a fully functional tech ecosystem. Peter has been part of designing and launching programs such as Corporate Engagement Program, Ventures Lab, Value Creation, Academia Engagement, Banking Products for startups, The Outliers and many more.Prior to joining Hub71, Peter was a Project Manager at Roland Berger Strategy Consultants. As a consultant, Peter worked on building tech ecosystems, developing country-wide strategies, building new ventures, driving partnerships between private and public sectors as well as digital transformation and restructuring. This previous experience allows Peter to play a key role in shaping Hub71’s strategy.Peter holds a bachelor’s degree in Civil and Environmental Engineering from the American University of Beirut (Beirut, Lebanon) as well as a Machine Learning certificate from Stanford University (California, USA).

Biography_ZH: 他曾在传统金融领域工作 14 年，职业经历横跨 Cantor Fitzgerald 结构性融资、美股 500 强企业的投资者关系以及财富管理，如今专注通过新兴的“比特币国库公司”浪潮，在比特币与传统资本市场之间搭建桥梁。
Biography_EN: Ex-TradFi professional with 14 years of experience spanning Structured Finance at Cantor Fitzgerald, Investor Relations for an S&P 500 company, and Wealth Management. Now focused on bridging Bitcoin and traditional capital markets through the emerging Bitcoin Treasury Company movement.

Biography_ZH: Philip Rage 是一位常驻伦敦的保险高管与数字资产专家，专注加密货币风险管理。他在再保险与保险行业深耕多年，在战略、创新与承保方面累积丰富经验，曾在怡安等机构任职。目前，他担任 Soter Insure 的承保负责人，这家公司专注数字资产保险，通过为比特币托管与 DeFi 提供专门保险产品，将传统金融与加密世界连接起来，使机构能够在受保护的框架下参与比特币业务。
Biography_EN: Philip Rage is a London-based insurance executive and digital assets specialist with a strong focus on cryptocurrency risk management. He has built a career in strategy, innovation, and underwriting within the (re)insurance sector, previously at firms like Aon.Currently Head of Underwriting at Soter Insure, a company specializing in digital asset insurance, Philip bridges traditional finance and crypto by providing coverage for Bitcoin in financial services.His work helps institutionalize Bitcoin custody and DeFi through specialized insurance products, making him a key figure in onboarding traditional capital to the space.

Biography_ZH: 塞尔维亚王储菲利普亲王（HRH Hereditary Prince Filip Karađorđević of Serbia）现任金融科技公司 JAN3 的首席战略官（CSO），在加入 JAN3 之前，他在传统金融领域工作 13 年。基于对比特币有望向数十亿人提供金融自由与主权的信念，他选择全职投身该领域。菲利普亲王强烈倡导通过比特币巩固个人财产权与金融自由，并推动有利于无银行账户人群的法律与制度框架。他常在国际会议上演讲，与各国元首、立法者、王室成员、政界人士和企业高管沟通，将比特币视作引领塞尔维亚乃至全球迎来新“文艺复兴”的关键力量。通过其在塞尔维亚设立的基金会，他积极推动基督信仰、文化遗产、金融素养、艺术、科技与家庭价值观。
Biography_EN: HRH Hereditary Prince Filip Karađorđević of Serbia serves as the Chief Strategy Officer (CSO) at JAN3, a global financial technology company. After a 13-year career in traditional finance, Prince Filip joined JAN3, driven by his belief in Bitcoin’s potential to deliver financial freedom and sovereignty to billions worldwide.Prince Filip advocates for strong individual property rights and financial freedom through Bitcoin, while promoting legal frameworks that enable economic empowerment for the unbanked. A frequent guest speaker at prestigious international conferences, he engages with heads of state, legislators, monarchs, politicians, and C-suite executives.Prince Filip envisions a new Renaissance, catalysed by Bitcoin, for Serbia and the wider world. Through his foundation in Serbia, he actively promotes Christianity, cultural heritage, financial literacy, the arts, technology, and family values.

Biography_ZH: Rachel Conlan 是一位具有远见的市场人和创业战略家，是币安全球市场与品牌活动背后的核心推动力。在币安致力于强化并拓展“全球最值得信赖加密品牌”定位的过程中，她的领导发挥着关键作用。加入币安前，她在 OKX 担任重要领导职务，主导品牌与营销工作，撮合并落地了包括曼城足球俱乐部、迈凯伦车队和翠贝卡电影节在内的一系列高能级国际合作。在此之前，她在国际体育与娱乐经纪巨头 CAA Sports 负责全球合作，通过创新品牌联名与文化营销项目，为全球品牌、版权方与明星之间搭建极具影响力的桥梁。她也曾担任 Havas 全球首席营销官（CMO），领导这家在 Vivendi 旗下、全球第六大传播集团的声誉与营收增长，为多家财富 500 强企业打造综合营销与体验式平台，并在 Havas 内部出任多个领导职位。作为 Havas Luxhub 总经理，她聚焦奢侈品、时尚与生活方式品牌如何触达并留住新一代消费者，其客户包括 LVMH、PUIG、苏富比、Net-a-Porter、NetJets 与 Kit and Ace 等。她还曾担任 Havas 全球增长总监，主导集团全球新业务与营销规划，并参与推动 Havas 在 2012 年从 Euro RSCG Worldwide 品牌重塑为今日 Havas Group 的关键工作。Rachel 目前与丈夫及年幼的儿子居住在阿布扎比。
Biography_EN: Rachel Conlan, a visionary marketer and entrepreneurial strategist is the driving force behind Binance's global marketing and brand campaigns. As Binance embarks on its ambitious journey to reinforce and broaden its standing as the world's most trusted cryptocurrency brand, Rachel's leadership is instrumental. Before joining Binance, Rachel was a transformative figure at OKX, spearheading brand and marketing initiatives that included the negotiation and launch of high-profile international partnerships with Manchester City F.C., McLaren Racing, and Tribeca Festival. Her strategic insights and knack for partnership creation have left indelible marks on the brand. Rachel's vast experience extends to her tenure at CAA Sports, a leading international sports and entertainment agency, where she held the reins of Global Partnerships. She developed innovative brand partnerships and cultural marketing programs, bridging global brands, rights holders, and talent, adding immense value and contributing to CAA's market influence. As the Global Chief Marketing Officer for Havas, the sixth-largest communications company within the Vivendi conglomerate, Rachel demonstrated exceptional leadership. She was entrusted with enhancing Havas' reputation and revenue, crafting integrated marketing and experiential platforms for Fortune 500 companies that set industry benchmarks. In addition to her role as CMO, Rachel's contributions to Havas spanned various leadership positions. As Managing Director of Havas Luxhub, she led strategic and commercial operations, fostering pioneering strategies for luxury, fashion, and lifestyle companies to engage and retain a new generation of consumers. Her client portfolio boasted iconic brands like LVMH, PUIG, Sotheby's, Net-a-Porter, Netjets, and Kit and Ace. Rachel's strategic prowess was further displayed in her role as Havas' Global Growth Director. She orchestrated a comprehensive global new business development and marketing plan for the network. Notably, Rachel was part of the visionary team behind Havas' 2012 rebrand from Euro RSCG Worldwide, establishing a new standard for Havas Group's transformation. Rachel resides in Abu Dhabi, UAE with her husband and toddler son.

Biography_ZH: Rahim Taghizadegan 被誉为“奥地利学派正统传承中的最后一位奥地利经济学家”，在奥地利、瑞士、列支敦士登与德国多所大学授课，著有 15 本以上作品，是首位在大学课堂系统讲授比特币的经济学家。他创立了位于楚格的 scholarium.at，致力于在全球建设“比特币城堡”和教育据点，并创办 deedsats.com，为基于 RGB 与比特币的数字资产构建注重隐私的解决方案。
Biography_EN: Rahim Taghizadegan is the last Austrian economist of the Austrian School in the direct tradition, teaching at universities in Austria, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, and Germany. Author of over 15 books, he was the first economist to teach about Bitcoin at university. He is the founder of scholarium.at, based in Zug, building Bitcoin citadels and educational hubs around the world, and of deedsats.com, building privacy-friendly solutions for digital assets on RGB and Bitcoin.

Biography_ZH: 比特币之前：2016 年毕业于印度理工学院马德拉斯分校结构工程硕士，2016–2021 年期间担任专业结构工程师，参与海上钻井平台、水处理厂、桥梁与地铁高架等工程。2017 年在区块扩容之争末期发现比特币，并迅速沉迷，完全自学货币史、奥地利经济学，以及密码学与数学。随着比特币热情不断加深，他开始学习编程并逐步参与比特币 FOSS 项目开发，2020 年起在 RGB 和 Bitcoin Core 做出早期贡献。他将这段从“Hello World 到 Bitcoin Core”的自学历程记录在博客中。2021 年，他放弃结构工程师职业，全职投入比特币开发，并成为印度首位获得 Spiral 开发者资助的人。从那以后，比特币成为他的人生使命：以一切力所能及的方式为“自由产业”贡献。比特币之后：作为开发者，他 2020–2021 年参与 Bitcoin Core 和 RGB，2021–2023 年在 BDK 团队工作，2023 年起担任 CoinSwap 的核心开发与项目经理。作为社区组织者，他于 2018 年共同创办印度首个“只谈比特币”的 Telegram 社群，2019 年在班加罗尔举办首场比特币 Only 线下聚会，2022 年又先后在果阿发起比特币聚会并承办印度首个比特币 Only 大会的技术议程。作为教育者，他自 2022 年起担任 Summer of Bitcoin 导师，并在 2023 年创立 Bitshala，通过系统教育项目培养新一代比特币开发者，为他们提供学习路径、降低进入 FOSS 的门槛，并通过带薪 Fellowship 计划，帮助他们为真实比特币项目做出专业贡献。
Biography_EN: Pre-Bitcoin:Graduated M.Tech in Structural Engineering in 2016, from IIT Madras.Worked as a professional Structural Engineer for offshore oil rigs, water treatment plants, bridges, and metro viaducts. 2016-2021.Found Bitcoin in 2017 at the dusk of the Blocksize War. Fell in love with the whole idea and started studying deeper. My journey has been entirely self-taught, where I taught myself the history of money, the principles of Austrian economics, and eventually cryptography and maths.Over time the Bitcoin obsession became so big, that I started learning to code. Eventually, I became good enough to start contributing to Bitcoin FOSS projects. Which landed my first part-time gig at RGB and my first little contributions to Bitcoin Core, in 2020.My journey self-studying at that time I documented in this blog: https://www.citadel21.com/from-hello-world-to-bitcoin-coreLeft my structural engineering career completely to work on Bitcoiin full-time by being blessed as the first recipient of the Spiral Dev Grant from India, in 2021.Since then my passion for Bitcoin has led me into an ongoing rabbit hole and it has become my life mission to contribute back to the Freedom Industry, in whatever way best I can.Post Bitcoin:Developer Works:Bitcoin Core Contributor: 2020-2021Developer at RGB: 2020-2021Developer at BDK: 20021-2023Lead Dev and PM in Coiinswap: 2023 onwards.Community Works:Cofounded the first Indian Bitcoin-Only Telegram channel: 2018.Organized the first Bitcoin-Only Meetup in Bangalore: 2019.Organized the first Biitcoiin-Only meetup in Goa: 2022.Organized the Technical Track of the first Bitcoin-Only Conference in India: 2022.Educational Works:Mentor at Summer of Bitcoin: Since 2022Started building Bitshala: 2023.Blogs: https://rajarshi149.medium.com/Bitshala:At Bitshala we organize a package of educational activities to train the upcoming Bitcoin developers. We offer a roadmap to aspiring developers, reducing the barrier to entry in Bitcoiin FOSS, and finally get them started with a paid Felklowshiip Program to start professional contributions to real Biitcoiin FOSS projects.Find more details here: https://bitshala.org/My Twitter: https://x.com/RajarshiMaitraPresentation Description:The presentation will be on Bitshala, explaining its objective, mission, and models.I will brief about all the programs we take up at Bitshala. The roadmap to becoming a Bitcoin development, and how people can start getting involved.I will talk a bit about the FOSS Dev mindset, soft-skills required to be a FOSS dev, and tips on selecting FOSS projects to start contributing.The talk concludes with a concrete roadmap for aspiring developers in the room to start taking Bitcoin FOSS as a viable career alternative.

Biography_ZH: 我的比特币之旅始于 2017 年，当时我还是一名网络安全顾问。某位客户遭遇网络攻击，黑客索要比特币赎金，而我几乎不了解这种新型货币。作为对变革性科技充满热情的计算机工程师，这次经历激发了我的好奇心，引导我深挖比特币潜力。随着研究深入并与同行交流，我结识了一位早已在挖矿并编写以太坊智能合约的技术朋友，这进一步点燃了兴趣。后来，我们共同创立 Miningrid，打造一个通过安全的非托管钱包简化比特币挖矿的平台，让所有人都能轻松参与。我的使命是通过让比特币挖矿及其生态变得易懂且易用，帮助更多人掌握这一新工具。
Biography_EN: My Bitcoin journey began unexpectedly in 2017 while working as a cybersecurity consultant. A client had fallen victim to a cyberattack, with the hackers demanding payment in Bitcoin—a currency I knew little about at the time. This experience sparked my curiosity as a computer engineer passionate about transformative technology, leading me to explore Bitcoin’s potential. After delving into research and connecting with colleagues, I met a tech-savvy friend who was already mining Bitcoin and coding Ethereum smart contracts, which deepened my interest. As the founders of Miningrid, we created a platform that simplifies Bitcoin mining through a secure, non-custodial wallet, making it accessible to all. My mission is to empower others by making Bitcoin mining and its ecosystem both understandable and approachable

Biography_ZH: Redouane Elkamhi 是多伦多大学罗特曼管理学院金融学教授，在战略与战术资产配置、加密货币与去中心化金融方面享有盛誉。他曾担任罗特曼金融创新中心下属金融实验室首任联合主任，主导区块链、DeFi 和加密创业方向的项目。凭借 20 多年经验，他长期为加拿大多家顶级养老金提供顾问服务，在“全基金管理”和创新投资策略方面提供深度洞见。其研究成果多次在顶尖学术与行业会议上发表，并刊载于一流金融与经济学期刊。Elkamhi 教授曾获得日本开发银行 Shimomura Fellowship、加拿大多所高校的科研卓越奖，并多次斩获 ICPM、PCAM、AFFI、GARP、IFM2、《金融研究评论》《资产定价研究评论》等机构与期刊的最佳论文奖。
Biography_EN: Redouane Elkamhi is a Professor of Finance at the Rotman School of Management, University of Toronto, and a renowned expert in strategic and tactical asset allocation, cryptocurrency, and decentralized finance. He served as the inaugural co-director of the Finance Lab at the Rotman Financial Innovation Hub, where he spearheaded initiatives in blockchain, decentralized finance, and crypto-ventures.With over two decades of experience, Professor Elkamhi has been a trusted senior advisor to several of Canada’s largest pension funds, providing insights into total fund management and innovative investment strategies. His research has been presented at premier academic and industry conferences and published in leading finance and economics journals.Professor Elkamhi's contributions to the field have earned him numerous accolades, including the prestigious Shimomura Fellowship from the Development Bank of Japan and Excellence in Research Awards from the University of Toronto and the University of Iowa. He has also received multiple Best Research Paper Awards from esteemed organizations and journals, such as ICPM, PCAM, AFFI, GARP, IFM2, the Review of Financial Studies, and the Review of Asset Pricing Studies.

Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 interviews_mena.csv 中补充）
Biography_EN: Roya Mahboob is an entrepreneur and Afghanistan’s first female tech CEO, but her impact extends far beyond the sphere of business. Ms. Mahboob has used her success and tech expertise to help educate and empower Afghan women and girls, and she has been an outspoken advocate for their rights. She founded the Digital Citizen Fund (DCF), which aims to increase Afghan women’s technological and financial literacy. She also co-founded and supports the Afghan Girls Robotics Team. Ms. Mahboob has worked to build Innovation/Tech Centers across Afghanistan and has launched an online platform to strengthen the voices of Afghan women and journalists. Ancillary to this, she regularly speaks and writes eloquently about the vital importance of STEAM education and economic opportunity for women and girls as they pertain to human rights. Ms. Mahboob was named to TIME’s 2013 list of 100 Most Influential People and received the 2014 Tribeca Disruptive Innovation Award, The Advancement of Gender Equality through Education Award, Young Leader of World Economic Forum 2015 , Asia Game changer 2019, Doha forum award of 2022, LantosHumanRights awards, the prestigious Presidential Leadership Scholarship and is a founding Leader of The NewNow, a group of rising global leaders tackling global challenges.

Biography_EN: Believe in Bitcoin, freedom & positive-sum energyShalini Wood is a marketing architect with extended experience across Fortune 100, academia & Web3.Recognized by Forbes as one of the Top 5 Female Executives Building a LastingLegacy in Blockchain, she played a foundational role at Babylon as the firstmarketing hire & CMO— scaling the brand from whitepaper into a $6BillionBitcoin staking pioneer. Under her leadership, Babylon didn’t just join amovement—it created it, giving rise to BTCfi, the now-emerging category thatconnects Bitcoin with the world of DeFi.She currently serves as Founding Advisor to Satoshi Financial, GCC’s firstdedicated Bitcoin treasury platform, a pioneering initiative in institutional-grade Bitcoin treasury management. She is also Advisor & Growth Partner toBotanix (Bitcoin Layer 2), Veera (Web3 browser & wallet with 3M+ users), and an emerging Layer 1 protocol (stealth).Shalini is an angel investor and strategic contributor to high-growth projectsincluding Lombard, Lorenzo, Allo, BOB, Hetu, and others. She has also invested in a number of Digital Asset Treasuries (DATs), including BNC BNB Treasury Company, MCVT SUI Treasury, ETH Zilla Treasury, Satsuma European Bitcoin Treasury Company, TONX Treasury, and more.Previously, she spent several years as a course designer and lecturer at Utrecht University in the Netherlands — one of Europe’s top research institutions — where she co-developed courses on blockchain, decentralization, and brand futures.Earlier in her career, she led regional marketing communications for Honeywell(Fortune 100), overseeing brand, PR, and digital strategy across the EMEA region— building visibility for mission-critical technologies in logistics, retail, and industrial systems.

Biography_EN: Simon is the President of Metaplanet Inc., a publicly traded company listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange. Metaplanet is undergoing a strategic transformation, leveraging Bitcoin as its principal treasury reserve asset. Metaplanet utilizes excess cash flow and implements accretive corporate governance, including financial management strategies such as debt and equity financing, to further its Bitcoin accumulation.Simon has been an active investor in the digital asset ecosystem since 2014. He started his career at Goldman Sachs in Tokyo as an equity derivatives trader. He was a co-founder and Chairman of Red Planet Hotels, a regional hotel company focused on Asia’s value hotel sector. Prior to founding Red Planet Hotels, Simon served as the Chief Executive Officer of Evolution Capital Public Company Limited, a real estate asset management company listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand. As President of Metaplanet, Simon is responsible for spearheading the company's new Bitcoin investment strategy, guiding its overall direction, raising capital, and managing investor relations. He graduated from Harvard University with an AB in Applied Mathematics. Simon is an active member of YPO, the premier global organization of chief executives.

Her recent work includes a closed-form framework for selecting optimal threshold signatures for Bitcoin custody and an in-depth analysis of pathfinding strategies across Lightning clients.

Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 interviews_mena.csv 中补充）
Biography_EN: Sonia Mayenco is the Head of Compliance for Rest-of-the-World (RoW) markets at Kraken, one of the world’s leading cryptocurrency platforms. A lawyer by training, Sonia brings over 10 years of experience in the crypto industry, with a focus on regulatory compliance, strategic market expansion and risk management across both emerging and mature markets.Sonia began her career in Singapore, where she was a founding member of Cryptosigma (now Toast), one of the earliest Bitcoin-based remittance startups. The company was recognized as one of the top 3 startups at the Singapore Startupbootcamp FinTech accelerator program in 2015, marking an early chapter in what would become a long-standing commitment to digital finance innovation.With extensive experience across APAC and LATAM, Sonia has helped shape global compliance strategies for a wide range of crypto products, including spot and margin trading, OTC trading, derivatives and tokenized equities. Today, she plays a pivotal role in Kraken’s expansion into emerging and regulated markets, helping bridge innovation with regulatory integrity.

Title_ZH: Executive Chairman & Director of Bitcoin Strategy
Title_EN: Executive Chairman & Director of Bitcoin Strategy
Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 interviews_mena.csv 中补充）
Biography_EN: Stafford Masie is a pioneering South African technologist, entrepreneur, and futurist with over three decades at the forefront of digital innovation. His career began in the early 1990s as a software developer at South Africa’s largest telecommunications company, followed by technology leadership roles at a major technology integrator. He went on to launch his own startup, later acquired, leading him to the U.S. tech scene in 1997, where he spent seven years immersed in Silicon Valley’s ecosystem of innovation at Novell’s HQ in Utah.Upon returning to South Africa in 2004 as Managing Director of Novell Sub-Saharan Africa, Stafford later established Google’s first presence in the country in 2006, serving as its founding country manager. He later launched thumbzup that invented the Payment Pebble®, a world-first globally adopted fintech innovation backed by Visa Inc.During 2014 he was first exposed to Bitcoin, sparking a lasting fascination up until today where he is known in SA as a Bitcoin maxi.Since then, Stafford has become a leading voice and investor in the African Bitcoin and crypto ecosystem. He has angel-invested in and advised multiple AI and blockchain startups, co-founded BitMach, a Bitcoin mining venture in South Africa, and is currently launching a crypto audit and analysis platform in the United States.He served as Chairman of the Board of Altvest Capital, which has since transformed into Africa’s first Bitcoin treasury company (BTCTC) listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE), where he now holds the position of Executive Chairman and Director of Bitcoin Strategy.In addition to his corporate leadership, Stafford independently advises African regulatory bodies on artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency legislation. He has previously served on the boards of Discovery Bank, ADvTECH, and Chairman WITS University/Telkom Innovation Lab, among others.Widely recognized as a Bitcoin maximalist, Stafford is passionate about “orange-pilling” key stakeholders and advocating for Bitcoin as a transformative force for financial sovereignty across the African continent.

Biography_EN: Stefan Kern is the Founder & CEO of the Bitkern Group, a Swiss based provider of high-performance computing and Bitcoin mining infrastructure, which he established in 2017. Under his leadership, Bitkern has grown into a trusted partner for private and institutional clients, offering scalable data-center solutions, managed hosting, and hardware procurement across multiple international locations.With a strong focus on energy efficiency, operational reliability, and technological excellence, Stefan has been instrumental in shaping the standards of professional Bitcoin mining. His strategic vision emphasizes the intersection of sustainability, innovation, and digital asset infrastructure, positioning Bitkern as a key player in the global high-performance computing landscape.

Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 interviews_mena.csv 中补充）
Biography_EN: Teresa Goody Guillén launched and leads the first AmLaw100 law firm's Digital and Innovative Markets Group, designed to seamlessly integrate traditional financial markets and the rapidly evolving digital markets. She has been advising on bitcoin and altcoin legal and business matters since 2015, has held BTC since 2017, and is an investor in crypto-related projects. In conjunction with co-leading the law firm’s Web3 and Digital Assets group, her team is comprised of multidisciplinary attorneys who each have expertise in the the technical and legal aspects of both traditional financial markets and crypto. Her team provides strategic advice on bitcoin, altcoins, stablecoins, capital, commodities, and derivatives markets to to a wide range of market and ecosystem participants, , including traditional and crypto exchanges (CEX and DEX), ATSs, public and private companies, payment processors, liquidity providers, private equity firms, venture capitalists, hedge funds, ETFs, and trade associations.Teresa also serves as a advisor to crypto and AI start-ups. Her practice includes regulatory and compliance guidance, conducting investigations, defending against enforcement actions, representing clients in litigation, and advising on business and transactional matters.She is nationally recognized as a leader in crypto and securities enforcement. She is Chambers ranked for Blockchain & Crypto and named to the Securities Docket's SEC "Enforcement Elite." She is recognized by The Legal500 for Dispute Resolution and Corporate Investigations and has been honored as Litigator of the Week by The AmLaw Litigation Daily. She hosts a fireside chat series Bulls, Bears, and Blockchain, serves as co-leader of The Digital Chamber's Token Alliance, and has taught Digital law & Policy at Georgetown University. In addition to her JD, she earned an MBA and is a Cryptocurrency Tracing Certified Examiner and Certified Fraud Examiner. She was formerly with the SEC's Office of the General Counsel (~15 years ago).
