Biography_EN: Tracy Ann Hoyos López is a strategic force in the Bitcoin and crypto space, currently serving as Chief of Staff, Strategic Initiatives to Arjun Sethi, CEO of Kraken, one of the world’s leading digital asset platforms. With a background in law and public service, Tracy now operates at the intersection of Bitcoin, crypto, policy, and high-level business strategy.She played a pivotal role in orange-pilling President Donald Trump, directly influencing his embrace of Bitcoin and crypto during the 2024 Presidential campaign. Her leadership helped secure President Trump’s historic appearance at the Bitcoin Conference and led to a record-breaking $25 million fundraising effort in just 1.5 months. Her efforts established Bitcoin and cryptocurrency as core components of the national political conversation in the United States.Tracy’s influence extends across the industry, bridging legal expertise, political acumen, and Bitcoin and crypto advocacy. At Kraken, she leads strategic initiatives that shape the company's positioning in both U.S. and global markets. Her deep understanding of regulatory dynamics, coupled with her commitment to financial freedom and decentralization, has made her a trusted advisor, a movement builder, and a driving force behind Bitcoin and crypto’s most important political and institutional breakthroughs.

Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 interviews_mena.csv 中补充）
Biography_EN: Co-Founder, Basketball.fun | , Chief Digital Equity Officer World MobileTristan Thompson is a championship-winning athlete, entrepreneur, and emerging voice at the intersection of sports, culture, and Web3. After more than a decade in the NBA, he’s shifted his focus to building the future of digital fan engagement and athlete empowerment through technology.As Co-Founder and Lead Advisor at Basketball.fun (TEASER HERE) , Tristan is reimagining what it means to be a fan. The platform gives people the chance to own NBA moments, make live predictions, and build their fan identity through tokenized player shares and clubs, turning the energy of game night into a participatory, on-chain experience. Built on Somnia’s blockchain, Basketball.fun is fast, gasless, and simple enough for anyone to use. It bridges sports, culture, and community while using stablecoins to make rewards instant, global, and real.Beyond sports innovation, Tristan serves as Chief Advisory Officer at AxonDAO, where he’s helping redefine how people control and monetize their health and bio-data. He’s also partnered with World Mobile, a decentralized project focused on expanding internet access.Tristan’s thought leadership has been featured in Forbes, Yahoo Finance , CoinDesk, Cointelegraph, Decrypt, The Block, and on CNBC Crypto World, The Street, Fox News, Thinking Crypto, and CoinMarketCap Live, where he was the first athlete ever featured. His high-profile interviews, including with Bo Hines, reflect his growing influence across sports, crypto, and technology.He recently spoke at Korea Blockchain Week, where he discussed athlete empowerment and decentralized fandom, and is set to appear next at Binance Blockchain Week and Bitcoin MENA, continuing to champion the conversation around Web3 adoption and digital ownership.Thought leadership Op-Eds penned by Tristan:Newsweek: NBA Champion Tristan Thompson: ‘AI is the Ultimate Teammate’Entrepreneur: How Building Tech With No Tech Background Taught Me the Most Valuable Skill in BusinessCointelegraph: Blockchain is the missing trust layer in sports analytics

Biography_EN: With over two decades of technical expertise, Wright Wang joined MicroBT in 2018 and contributed to the development of two generations of ASICs. Subsequently, he transitioned from R&D to marketing and was promoted to Marketing Director in 2019. Wright possesses a profound understanding of the technical challenges faced by MicroBT’s customers and has successfully collaborated with numerous clients to achieve mutually beneficial outcomes. Under his able leadership, MicroBT has garnered recognition as a reputable brand, consistently delivering high-quality WhatsMiner products that are widely acclaimed by global customers. In 2023&2024, he was bestowed with the Outstanding Contribution Award of MicroBT, led the key client project team and won the award for outstanding team.

Biography_EN: My style is to blend financial savvy with a passion for Bitcoin and conservative values. I seek to offer my clients and peers with a fresh, informed perspective on wealth management. I am interested in the intersection of behavior, incentives, and markets. My thoughts are inspired by the works of Srinivasan, Booth, Alden and many more. My values stem from my Christian faith. My hobbies, marriage, and involvement in communities keep me inspired. To stay active, I enjoy skiing, golfing, camping and hunting. #1 YIMBY and urbanist.Founding member and Chief Marketing officer of the Space. Founder of Basilic Financial, a Bitcoin Wealth Management Firm.

Biography_EN: Xiaohui Liu is the founder and CEO of OP_CAT Labs, a R&D company focused on OP_CAT technology on Bitcoin. He created sCrypt, a high-level smart contract language for Bitcoin. He also created the CAT protocol, the first miner-validated token standard on Bitcoin using OP_CAT. Before creating sCrypt, he worked as a research scientist at Facebook’s Connectivity Lab. Xiaohui holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science on p2p distributed networking.

Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 interviews_mena.csv 中补充）
Biography_EN: Yat Siu, Co-Founder and Executive Chairman, Animoca BrandsVeteran technology entrepreneur/investor Yat Siu is the co-founder and executive chairman of Animoca Brands, a global leader in Web3, blockchain, gaming, and tokenization with the goal to provide all users with property rights for virtual assets. Yat began his career at Atari Germany, then established Hong Kong Cybercity/Freenation, the first free web page and email provider in Asia. In 1998 he set up Outblaze, an award-winning pioneer of multilingual white label web services. After selling one of its business units to IBM, he pivoted Outblaze to incubate digital entertainment projects. One of those projects is Animoca Brands.Yat has numerous accolades, including Global Leader of Tomorrow at the World Economic Forum, Young Entrepreneur of the Year at the DHL/SCMP Awards, and recognition as one of Cointelegraph's top 100 notable people in blockchain. A classically trained musician, Yat is a member of the advisory board of BAFTA (British Academy of Film and Television Arts) and a director of the Asian Youth Orchestra.

Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 interviews_mena.csv 中补充）
Biography_EN: Yoni Assia is the Co-Founder and CEO of eToro, the trading and investing platform. Yoni co-founded eToro in 2007 with the vision of a world where everyone can trade and invest in a simple and transparent way. Today, the platform has over 40 million registered users from 75 countries and empowers users to trade, invest, share and learn.Yoni showed an interest in finance and computer science from his youth and so decided to merge his passions and his belief in the power of shared knowledge by founding eToro. eToro is a collaborative investment community designed to provide users with the tools they need to grow their knowledge and wealth. Users can hold a range of traditional and innovative assets and choose how to invest: trade directly, invest in a portfolio, or copy other investors.Yoni is widely acknowledged as a crypto pioneer, having co-written the Colored Coins whitepaper with Ethereum creator Vitalik Buterin in 2012. He is also the founder of GoodDollar, the largest, community-driven blockchain UBI project in the world.Yoni is a member of the YPO and was included by Financial News in its Fintech 40 ranking and their Rising Stars in Asset Management ranking. He was also listed in Fortune’s 40 under 40 and in City A.M’s fintech 100 top influencers.
